job_lists.company: 騰雲科技服務股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
「科技創造智慧生活」
搶先將金融科技與零售科技融合是我們的現況，
不斷追求服務與創新是我們的目標，
研發創生態並貼近生活的應用是我們團隊的願景，
立足台灣邁向國際是我們的下一步。

「我們需要的人才」
1. 對研發產品有高度熱情，將興趣融入工作。
2. 自我要求高，主動積極的態度。
3. 團隊目標優先，樂於分享與理解他人。
4. 企圖心強，責任感高，以成為特定產品或服務的專家為目標。
5. 不排斥學習新技術並以開放的態度和團隊合作。

「主要工作項目」 
1. Android 平台的 App 行動應用/物聯網程式開發。 
2. 協助研發軟體新技術與新工具。
- 熟悉 Java，有Android平台之應用程式開發經驗者尤佳！ 
- 熟悉金流應用整合尤佳!
 
如果您渴望找一個能自由發揮、活力十足的伙伴、不斷學習新技術的團隊，請當面和我們聊聊！

2. 具一年以上的 Android APP 開發經驗 
3. 熟悉 Android SDK 
4. 有APP上架作品佳
5. 具備獨立開發能力(架構設計/流程設計/除錯/效能調整)
6. 有零售或餐飲相關應用開發經驗佳

job_lists.title: 軟體產品經理 （上海）
job_lists.company: 美商Wolf Dataware 五甫科技_高鋒投資股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
大家好，我們是「Wolf Dataware」五甫科技，身為由矽谷出發，成為亞太第一名的醫療應用軟體服務商，我們希望未來加入五甫大家庭的人，有著跟我們有一樣的願景。可以藉由提供精準醫療的數據分析，給醫療院所或研究機構，讓他們服務的病人可以得到最佳的治療方式。

目前Wolf Dataware把美國幫助各大醫療院所導入臨床研究系統的經驗，帶到亞洲來幫助亞洲的醫學中心進行臨床試驗管理，協助醫院有效控制成本，提高臨床研究的成功率。目前產品的主要用戶包含美國新聞與世界報導 (U.S.News & World Report)前50名的醫院，如：排名第二名的克裏夫蘭醫療中心(The Cleveland Clinic)，及第三名的麻省總醫院(Massachusetts General Hospital)等等。

Wolf Dataware也提供医院及研究中心客制化的解决方案，包含協助細胞治療中心搜集與分析治療所產生的數據、協助基因研究中心整合樣品與檢驗數據，管理實驗室實驗數據。同時也可以幫助醫院搭建緊急應變中心，幫助醫療院所長期監控病人生理數據。

公司的目標是藉由統合基因治療、醫療數據、細胞治療等，建立精準醫療平台。最後提供臨床研究服務，把實驗室的發現，經過臨床一二三期的試驗，讓更多病人可以得到最新的精準醫療治療方式。

創辦人Daniel，台大92級，畢業後去美國杜克大學唸碩士，之後待在矽谷上班跟創業，近期才又回來台灣，目前遊走於上海與台北兩地之間。

【職務說明】
1. 具備2年以上管理跨部門團隊與 Web/ App 產品開發的相關經驗
2. 熟悉 Value Proposition、Business Canvas、Storyboard、User Flow、Wireframe 等開發工具
3. 熟悉 Scrum、Agile 等敏捷開發的概念
4. 良好中英文溝通技巧
5. 英文達到工作水平以上
6. 能夠適應新創的彈性工時與工作強度
7. 產品開發主管經驗
8. 曾有開發過英文介面 Web/ App 的經驗
9. 本身即熟悉程式語言，並曾經自己編寫程式
10. 曾擔任設計師，有 UI/ UX 產品設計相關經驗
11. 數位行銷、數據分析相關經驗

【連絡方式】信箱 recruit@wolfdataware.com

【工作地點】上海市興榮路788號 （有提供食宿，及台灣上海來回機票）

【工作時間】週一至週五 9：00~18：00

【公司福利】
1. 免費零食
2. 不定期出遊與聚餐
3. 有興趣也有機會到上海或其他業務地點走走

【在Wolf Dataware你能得到】
1. 實務創業經驗
2. 創辦人矽谷創業、產品開發、尋找投資人之經驗分享
3. 未來有機會前往矽谷跟上海做產品發表
4. 一群來自不同領域卻能共同努力的好夥伴

【歡迎加入】
．團隊氣氛歡樂、融洽，我們致力打造一個有family感覺的工作環境，但實際工 作起來也不失嚴謹
．如果你是對醫療新創事業、穿戴式產品、或是社區關懷有興趣的，都非常歡迎。
．我們不需要最強的人，但我們需要有理想、有抱負、對自己有期許的人。
．歡迎將履歷(可附作品集)寄到：recruit@wolfdataware.com
．了解更多關於我們，可以到我們的網站 https://www.wolfdataware.com/

job_lists.title: App Leader (Senior PM)
job_lists.company: 台灣森遊有限公司
job_lists.content: R&W is a product creation studio and agency with offices in Taipei, NYC, and HK. We build all kinds of awesome things: from Pokemon apps to AI-based science apps to app-based teddy bears and autonomous drones and rest APIs for 12 million users. We help banks implement Apple Pay, and help vehicle manufacturers do growth hacking. Our clients are in the US, Europe, around Asia, and yes, in Taiwan too.This position is fun, demanding, educational, and wide-ranging. You'll be creating new apps, iterating on current apps, and growing things using a set of sweet design and automated marketing tools.The role is best suited for someone who is a designer, and a digital marketer, and a developer, but in her/his heart is an organizer. We have several former startup founders on our team who have raised funding and led app businesses, and we're looking for someone who could probably start a startup, or already has, but is ready to join a strong and experienced team and sharpen her/his sword on multiple world-class apps - and go deeper into machine learning, computer vision, and leading growth experiments.This would be a good fit for someone who: 0. is organized, and helps other people stay organized 1. who has written a lot of good specs before 2. with some skill and recent experience coding 3. someone who has spent real money on mobile app install ads 4. loves reading Apple's Human Interface Guidelines every time they are updated 5. someone who already has a favorite marketing automation Saas tool, and is kind of an expert at using it to measure and get results from growth experimentsPMs on our team manage between 2-8 apps at the same time. Some of these apps have 50 users per day, some have 500k users per day. Collectively we publish new releases and/or run growth experiments hundreds of times each month.Some general requirements: - Have created, published, and grown at least 2 native mobile apps. - Have created full stack web products before. - Comfortable taking projects from the design phase to a stable production release - Has led development sprints - Is pretty much an expert on using iTunes Connect and the Play Store developer console to publish appsSome specific requirements: - Comfortable writing specs in English with enough detail to satisfy execs and devs - Comfortable using Github to review code, approve pull requests for automated code deployments - Comfortable creating FB app install ad campaigns, running A|B tests, using FB pixels, etc

Assist improving service deployment process across teams to ensure end-user experience3. Automate common infrastructure operation tasks as web application 4. Survey, test and integrate API of cloud solutions5. Write document for system design and implementation

job_lists.title: 軟體開發經理
job_lists.company: 數位人科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Summary: 
Generally manages a group of SW Development Engineers from both a personnel and product perspective while supporting the architectural and process initiatives from the company. Relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. The ideal candidate will be a hands on developer first and then hire a team of developers.



Essential Duties and Responsibilities:  Primary duties include but are not limited to:
• Establishes a collaborative, engineering-driven team environment which is consistent with our company’s culture.
• Responsible for ensuring Software development standards and the Software development Process are followed. Develop strategies to improve software development processes and product quality.
• Be the primary interface for the managed team with other functional teams within the organization
• Build relationships with other software development and quality engineering group managers, to facilitate cross-organizational software development projects.
• Proactively develop and execute plans, recruit, staff, and measure individual job performance and develop the talents of members of the managed team.
• Prepare reports, project plans, risks/issues and make presentations on status of the managed team’s projects. 
• Willingness to do whatever it takes to get the job done. And responsible for delivery of software to the committed schedule with high quality
• Supports product management in writing product requirement documents, implements and tracks development timelines, negotiates feature sets with the development leads and product managers. 

Qualifications:
• Excellent oral and written communication skills and can work with group in different geographical locations.
• Meticulous attention to detail and strong organization skills.
• Strong demonstrated engineering team leadership skills.
• Strong skills in representing the needs of managed teams to upper management.
• Strong decision making, analytical, problem solving, conflict resolution and change management skills.
• Able to hire and develop software developers.
• Knowledge of Windows, Linux and Android operating systems
• Knowledge of and implementing software development methodologies and lifecycle.
• Able to be hands with software development.




Supervisory Responsibilities:
• Manages a team of software development engineers to architect, design software products/applications. 
• Performing periodic code reviews and performance reviews
• Educating team members
• Participating in staffing decisions
• Communicating the needs and concerns of the development teams

Language Skills: 
• Proficient in English

job_lists.title: [MS] Account Technology Strategist (ATS) (EPG約聘人員)-105JP
job_lists.company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
The Account Technology Strategist (ATS) exists to “ Enable the Business & IT goals of our Customers, by enabling business value with the Microsoft Platform, thus securing long-term Sustainable Growth for Microsoft in a Cloud First, Mobile First World!” 

How does the ATS add value? 

Gathers and provides 360° insight of IT Technology profile, Partner and Competitive landscape of key customers to the entire Microsoft v-team 
Builds Trusted Technology Relationships with Technical Decision Makers, incl. the CIO, the CTO and their direct reports, as well as the IT-Pro’s within the customer’s organization 
Develops a long-term Business-to-IT strategy and facilitates Deployment Roadmaps through effective orchestration of Microsoft and Partner Resources.
Accelerate growth by ensuring the customers environment is ready to deploy new Microsoft Solutions that especially on O365 solutions 
Helps drive revenue growth by enabling the maturity of the customer’s infrastructure for faster consumption (deployment and adoption) of Microsoft’s Cloud、Mobility and Security solutions.. 

How is the ATS role unique? 

Its focus on long-term, sustainable Growth. 
Its in-depth knowledge of customers’ IT Technology environments. 
Its ability to ensure that the customer’s deployment of Microsoft’s technologies are poised to accept the latest Microsoft Innovations and Solutions 
Its ability to build long-term Trusted Technology Relationships which result in solid and meaningful Strategic Technology conversations. 
Its broad knowledge of the Microsoft Enterprise Platform, and the ability to map relevant IT Technology Solutions to the customers’ IT and Business needs and priorities. 

Key Initiatives & Challenges: 

Consumption: Drives a customer-validated Consumption Plan, supported by the STU, Microsoft Services and Partner resources. 
Capability-Led Selling: Initiates the capability deployment conversation as a Trusted Technology Advisor to the TDM and supports STU or Partner resources in driving strategic opportunities. 
Solution Selling: Identifies and supports Solution opportunities, owned and orchestrated by ATU, STU, Services and Partner resources.
job_lists.other_condition:
4-6 years of related IT & Cloud solution experience. 
 Affiliation with Technology is required. 
 Experience in Consultative Selling is recommended. 
 Extensive experience in working within teams is required. 
 Experience in Project Management is recommended. 
 Supervisory experience is preferable 
 Requires a bachelor degree in Computer Science or a similar information technology-related discipline. 
 Additional training or education in Business, Sales or Marketing is preferable. 
 Prefers certification in Microsoft or relevant cloud, data center or mobility technologies

job_lists.title: 資深前端工程師 Sr. Front-End Developer (熟Angular or React)
job_lists.company: 好好投資科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
【職務說明】
主要工作為前端Angular or React開發，並與企劃、設計、後端人員協同合作。

【必備技能】(本項不符請勿投遞)
1.不含學習時間，必須有一年以上Frameworks(Angular or React)實務開發經驗。
2.熟Javascript(具手刻JS功能模組及修改套件能力),DIV,CSS3,HTML5(RWD)技術。
3.具裝置、瀏覽器相容性及主要限制、版面效果調整經驗（IE、FireFox、Chrome）。
4.連 API 抓Data時，能針對mobile與Web版運用不同取資料方式。
5.能適當運用空間、圖片、排版(typography)、標題、字型、icon、內外邊距(padding / margin)、格線系統(grid)。
6.重視使用者體驗(UX)，對前端工程師工作有強烈熱情者 。

我們正在找人，但尋志同道合，寧缺也不願濫選！我們不只找員工，更覓共同打拼的事業夥伴，雖是新創公司，但福利絕對優於上市公司。

您應該看得出，我們不同一般公司更認真仔細地徵才，注重每個環節，這是我們做好一件小事的標準，我們是站在世界金融科技風口的團隊，也是「79%」一定會成功的新創公司！這剩下「21%」的不確定，等待優秀且舉足輕重的您來為我們補足，如您只是帶著打工的心態，請不要來！如希望找到環境好，福利佳，能力快速成長的公司，歡迎您來試試看。

【徵才前提】(以下五項前提，任一未具備者勿投履歷)
1.對有金融科技有興趣與熱情，想參與最夯的金融科技專案。(您現在不需很懂金融，但要有興趣) 。
2.注重細節及使用流程，能從使用者角度思考。
3.對 Web、Mobile Web開發、新技術開發具高度興趣及熱忱。
4.具主動、獨立作業與思考能力、執行能力強、勇於跳出框架思考的能力。
5.能有良好溝通表達能力、擇善不固執及團隊精神。

【為何要選好好】
1.我們重視工作氣氛，在這講求團隊互助合作， 鼓勵主動提案改善，不墨守成規，打造活力無限、笑聲不斷、樂在工作的熱血團隊。
2.我們重視技術人才的培育與職涯發展，提供內部技術交流學習、外部訓練課程(公司出資)，透過不同階段工作安排與規劃，工作輪調機制，培育各領域儲備人才，讓每位員工擁有個人發展舞台與空間。
3.我們重視員工生活，公司提供內外部各項參與社團活動、旅遊補助、電影欣賞等，讓您在工作之餘，可以安排個人休閒娛樂，享受工作，樂於生活。
4.內部環境自由，可自由參與其他大數據、PHP、資料庫等學習，不斷增加能力。

【關於薪資】
我們願意提供高於一般行情的薪酬，給具價值的您，確切薪資於面試時，將依實際能力/作品/經驗進行為最終核定，工作年資對我們不是非常重要。
job_lists.other_condition:
加分條件：
1. 熟 jQuery等網站前端Library、bootstrap...等
2. 有PHP基本概念 、懂 MVC 框架 
3. 熟MySQL
4.懂 Linux 系統尤佳 
5.具 Git 版本控制使用經驗。
6.具SEO及整合Web API經驗。


也歡迎碩博士在校學生Apply，我們彈性的工時可以讓您兼顧學業與工作。
[有相關開發經驗者優先錄取] (面試時需能Demo作品-金融相關尤佳)

------------ [積極主動自薦方式] ------------
如果你有興趣申請職務，請發送電子郵件至人資信箱：hr@howfintech.com
並附上您的簡歷和告訴我們以下內容：

1.介紹一下您自己，包括你為何對這職務興趣？（我們喜歡積極主動自薦之人）
2.您遇過最困難的挑戰與您如何面對與克服？（我們超愛有故事的人生！）
3.您有那些優勢？為何本職務非您莫屬？（這可能是您具備的技術或專長等）
4.除領薪水，您工作＂具體＂目標？(可能是志向、抱負等但別寫為了世界和平)
5.說說您目前月(年)薪(請寫真的！有本事拿到offer，我保證核薪高於你的前工作)
6.最後，談談您申請本職務期望薪資(別寫＂依公司規定＂，以加速核薪時間！)

job_lists.company: 香港商我的大日子股份有限公司(籌備處)
job_lists.content:
我的大日子 MyBigDay 是一個以婚禮及工商宴會活動之 SAAS 為主的一個自創品牌，目前已經獲得 Pre A 投資。

主要需求人員：

Javascript 工程師
Javascript 已從最原始的前端 Web 控制語言，進一步使用 node.js 佔領了後端，現在也因為 React Native 的出現一統前端語言環境，本公司希望建立一個完整的 Javascript 開發團隊，完成全系列的產品，也因為目前 React Native Framework的不足，公司支持再轉案進程中同時發佈並維護一些 Open Source project 為整個 Javascript community盡一份心力。

基本需求：
很強的 Pure Javascript 開發能力
很熟悉 Linux 環境
快速學習的能力

本公司可以提供您可能感興趣的部分：
1.面對大陸市場的機會
2.對於Javascript社群的貢獻
3.參與創業的過程，學會如何要到投資
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: 技術總監 Technical Director
job_lists.company: 恩克斯網路科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果你對 Web/App 技術有著強烈的熱情，以開發出高質感、高效能與超讚 UX 的產品為目標，並且對於新創公司與產品經營有興趣，獎金獵人會是你最好的舞台。你將負責帶領技術團隊，確保開發時選擇的語言、framework、開發流程是最適合我們的，並且確保品質和細節，重視溝通，做出超棒的產品，並帶領工程師們一同成長。

獎金獵人使用 Phalcon 開發網站程式，前端使用 Vue.js，目前以獎金佈告（收集各種比賽資訊）、辦比賽平台（自動化的比賽網站架設系統）和作品集（讓參賽者累積作品）三大功能為主，我們立志於幫助更多創作者透過各種機會實現夢想。目前專案管理流程使用 Scrum，讓大家可以自主掌握進度。

工作內容 Skills/Experience
・負責帶領團隊維護現有產品以及開發新產品
・針對公司網站產品提出改善方式並做優化
・以技術角度分析公司產品並參與公司發展策略、方向討論
・規劃最適合我們的開發流程以及訓練流程，讓團隊養成溝通的好習慣
・鑽研新的技術並帶入產品

經歷和技能
・熟悉 PHP、MySQL、HTML、CSS、Javascript 等各種技術
・熟悉各種 MVC Framework 以及各種前端 Frameworks 如 Vue.js 或 Angular.js
・熟悉 API 化的系統串接
・熟悉網站產品開發或 APP 產品開發流程（網站架構，流程圖和 Wireframes）
・擅長使用網路工具如 Slack、Trello（Asana、Basecamp、Redmine）、Hackpad 等
・程式開發經驗 10 年以上 

加分技能
・我們有矽谷投資人並且目標國際，希望你能說英文，我們將帶你一起發展國際
・對 Phalcon 有經驗
・對手機 iOS 或 Android 開發有經驗（我們未來將有手機計畫，希望你也可以參與）
・懂產品並有數據分析、產品成長的經驗
・有網站或 APP 相關的創業經驗

必要特質
・個性特質：Passion & Coachable - 正面熱情、懂得自我省思
・工作習慣：Proactive, Responsive and Over-communicating - 主動積極、反應快、重視溝通

MBA尤佳。

job_lists.title: 資訊管理顧問
job_lists.company: 勤業眾信聯合會計師事務所
job_lists.content: 身為一個資訊管理顧問，我們需要您協助的主要工作內容如下：1. 大型企業 專案資訊整合規劃/設計與施行2. 資訊平台 設計開發與建置3. 套裝軟體 (eg. SAP/Oracle)規劃與導入我們須具備以下要求： (不相關者請勿投遞)1. 資管系相關學歷2. IT實務與專案經驗 (2~3年)3. 具系統開發，程式撰寫，系統分析能力4. 參與過資料整合相關專案此為Junior職缺，畢業後至中大型企業資訊部服務2~3年內為佳我們是一個快速成長、注重跨領域整合、且善於團隊合作的顧問團隊。我們為企業提供全方位管理顧問諮詢服務，致力成為客戶長期的策略夥伴， 我們每個人都具備不同背景及經歷，但我們都專注於不斷學習、互相激勵及貢獻團隊，我們共同合作提供市場發展策略、品牌行銷、財務暨績效管理、組織營運、人力資本、資訊科技應用等輔導諮詢，我們是「企業諮詢服務( Enterprise Advisory Service)」顧問團隊。現在，我們正在尋找新的績效管理夥伴，一同帶領企業諮詢服務團隊更上一層樓，因此，作為一位「資訊管理顧問」我們需要你負責：1. 聆聽、了解、分析與溝通客戶對於資訊解決方案的需求與期待2. 取得客戶信任並維持良好關係3. 由客戶出發，提出靈活且創新的方法，但以邏輯思維嚴謹的檢視及發展行動方案4. 整合來自團隊中不同成員想法，為提供客戶提供量身訂做的解決方案5. 溝通協調專案資源，讓每位夥伴發揮所長及持續成長6. 具備原則但保有彈性，因應團隊與客戶現況，進行專案調整與管理7. 了解與認同團隊對服務提供之品質標準要求，並於專案管理中持續進行高品質的成果管理
job_lists.other_condition: 我們希望你能夠擁有以下特質：1. 以同理心理解每家客戶的困難，並具備幫助客戶成長的熱情2. 勇於面對問題與挑戰，強大執行力與抗壓性3. 尊重與聆聽不同想法及意見4. 思路邏輯清晰，表達能力佳5. 對新議題或新領域保持好奇心6. 帶領團隊合作，樂於分享與助人，保持專案團隊士氣與氛圍7. 不滿足於現況，持續思考更佳的方式我們保證，你可以於這份工作中獲得：1. 不同產業、不同客戶及不同領域的專業顧問輔導經驗2. 與企業CEO、CFO等高階領導人對話的機會3. 接觸產業領導企業之專案機會4. 跨國團隊合作或跨國案件輔導機會5. 影響企業決策並改善企業表現的成就感6. 快速成長的職涯體驗7. 一群可以一起面對挑戰、一起成長又一起享樂的工作夥伴

job_lists.title: (外商銀行) IT Project Manager_201MW
job_lists.company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
※本職缺為一年期派遣。

Job Description: 

This position will be responsible for IT aspects of the System web vendor application implementation, coordinating with in-region and global stakeholders. Duties will include planning and driving IT tasks, tracking task progress and project status reporting, issue resolution and escalation, and ensuring compliance with IT policies and procedures. 

Requirements: 

•Bachelor’s degree along with 5+ years’ experience in Financial Services, preferably: Capital Markets and Foreign Exchange, Derivatives, Equity or Securities Lending. 
•Experience implementing and integrating vendor systems into banking/trading platforms, preferably in Taiwan or other APAC countries 
•Experience implementing systems on new datacenter infrastructure (network/servers) - this role will need to work closely with internal infrastructure teams.  
•Ability to work independently with minimal supervision (from managers in other countries).  
•Ability to lead through influencing, not by command-and-control but through collaboration.  
•Strong communication skills, verbal and written, applied across various levels of the organization to coordinate with global stakeholders.  
•Strong analytical and problem solving skills, with high attention to detail  
•Self-motivated, creative and efficient in proposing solutions to complex, time-critical problems  
•Ability to adapt quickly in a changing environment, while maintaining the value proposition
job_lists.other_condition: English CV is required when applying the position.

job_lists.company: 伯樂亞太管理顧問有限公司
job_lists.content:
[正職- 代客戶徵才]
泰國曼谷 產品總監
工作內容:
1. 在互娛事業群和集團市場戰略指導下，制定互動娛樂事業群的產品方向、產品類型、運營方針，對娛樂、時尚、影視長期發展進行規劃，推動事業群快速發展，以支援事業群的預期經營目標。
2. 統籌事業群多個專案產品設計和規劃、風險防範，制定適合互動娛樂產品特點的產品標準，負責框架制定和產品專案監管。
3. 對各產品線的運營情況進行監控和指導，承擔和落實互娛事業群各項關鍵經營指標，負責對公司產品的整體建設進行規劃、領導團隊執行規劃，推進各產品線的建設工作。
4.對所管轄團隊的績效進行管控分析與業績指引，及時調整相應的策略和計畫，確保完成整體目標和戰略計畫。

福利:
*正規合法的工作簽證
*薪水為稅後
*附星級酒店式套房住宿(含健身房、游泳池等設備)
*另有餐補津貼、機票津貼、旅遊、帶薪年假等各項福利

3. 必須有2年以上大流量網站(直播/通訊/金融交易/論壇/門戶網站等)營運經驗

job_lists.title: Consultant - Secure Infrastructure Team (Services 約聘人員)
job_lists.company: 台灣微軟股份有限公司 (Microsoft)
job_lists.content: Secure Infrastructure team in Microsoft Enterprise Services Delivery is looking for a talented, passionate and experienced Consultant to join our team in China. This is a highly-visible role responsible for delivering projects throughout Asia, with primary focus on growing the business in China. Secure Infrastructure is the biggest of the five core technical domains that have been formed. We cover 20+ products including Azure Infrastructure, Windows Server, Windows Client, System Center, Hyper-V, VMM, Active Directory, Azure AD, Azure RMS, Devices & Application Management, CyberSecurity, Security & Identity, and etc.We are currently hiring Consultants in China with expertise in one or more of the above technologies. As Secure Infrastructure Consultant, your primary objective is to assist Microsoft customers designing or deploying parts of their Information Systems leveraging Server and Cloud technologies. A Consultant in Microsoft Services delivers technical solutions to customers allowing them to maximize their investment in Microsoft technology. Building upon solid IT project experience relative to their level, consultants will work to assist customers in:   • The delivery of high quality engagements around Microsoft Secure Infrastructure technologies and products in diverse client environments.    • Large scale, multi-site design, rollout and operational experience around core Microsoft Infrastructure components• Stabilizing developed solutions using Microsoft methodologies in complex customer environments. • The design and development of integrated solutions using the latest Microsoft products and technologies.   • Understanding the relevant application development, infrastructure and operations implications of the developed solution.
job_lists.other_condition: The ideal candidate must have experience in the following areas:• Strong consulting background and in depth, hands on customer delivery experience with one or more Microsoft technologies and products, including Azure Infrastructure, Windows Server, Windows Client, System Center, Hyper-V, VMM, Active Directory, Azure AD, Azure RMS, Devices & Application Management, Cyber Security, Security & Identity.    • Proven technical field experience in designing and deploying large scale, deployment and rollout, and operational experience in one or more technologies above • Good technical pre-sales skills such as professional services effort estimation, scoping workshops, working with Architects and partners to define WBS, roles and responsibilities • Field consulting experience, with large global Customers / Partners, on infrastructure architecture design, developing solution guidance and leading complex consulting engagements • Delivering consulting engagements, managing customer expectations Required Knowledge and Abilities • Communication skill in Mandarin and English. • Analytical Problem Solving • Building Customer/Partner Relationships • Confidence • Cross-Boundary Collaboration • Impact and Influence • Interpersonal Awareness • Product & Technology Expertise • Dealing with ambiguity Education, Training and Certifications • Must have a degree in Computer Science or Engineering, or equivalent work experience.     • 3+ years of experience in IT system development or consulting   • Work experience should involve technical consulting, development, and deployment. • Microsoft or other related industry certifications are a plus • Must have a proven record of delivering business value.

job_lists.title: Project Manager (Microsoft Services 約聘人員)
job_lists.company: 台灣微軟股份有限公司 (Microsoft)
job_lists.content:
Are you passionate about using technology to solve some of the toughest problems facing the largest companies and government agencies around the world? Do you value the deployment of solutions into production with real world impact? Are you obsessive about the quality and consistency of the work you do in leading teams to deliver value and meeting the mission of customers?

If so, the Project Manager position in the Microsoft Services Organization is for you!

Part leader, part mentor, and part consultant, our team of Project Managers comprises a mix of project management and consulting skills, along with a passion for technology. We are responsible for keeping the project team working on the highest priority tasks, removing risks and impediments, and leading the communication with the end customer.  We pride ourselves on our collaborative team culture, helping other team members to be successful, sharing our ideas and our work, and building upon others’ work. 

As a trusted advisor to our customers, you will be responsible for the successful execution of one or more projects at a time, providing guidance, coaching, and project leadership. By mentoring and influencing, you will drive the highest quality and the strongest sense of customer focus on each project.

The Project Manager’s primary responsibilities include:

• Leading one or more teams at a time to successfully deliver on customer solutions
• Ensuring adherence to cost, schedule, and scope constraints by tracking budget and forecasts utilizing a formal Statement of Work (SOW)
• Working with the customer to manage the scope of an engagement and make adjustments throughout the course of the engagement
• Advocating adherence to industry standard processes 
• Providing actionable coaching feedback to team members to foster continuous improvement in the spirit of a growth mindset
• Travel to customer sites will be required
job_lists.other_condition:
Relevant Characteristics and Experience for the Project Manager Role:

• Certifications in Project Management (PMP or PRINCE2) with real world experience are preferred.
• Demonstrated effectiveness in leading teams (when you lead, do people follow?)
• Excellent Mandarin and English oral and written communication including strong executive presence at the CXO level
• Broad understanding and experience with the Microsoft platform.  Office 365 or related technologies, including core infrastructure, Active Directory, Cloud Identities, Exchange, SharePoint and Lync is an advantage  
• Ability to identify risks and to develop mitigation and avoidance strategies
• Consulting experience preferred, but not required
• The ability to quickly establish credibility and trust with customers and internal stakeholders, and influence them about the merits of the chosen approach

job_lists.title: Manufacturing Test Engineer (MCIO 約聘人員)
job_lists.company: 台灣微軟股份有限公司 (Microsoft)
job_lists.content:
Introduction:
Microsoft Cloud Infrastructure and Operations is the team behind the cloud.  MCIO is responsible for delivering over 200 Microsoft web portals, Live and Online Services around the world including infrastructure, security & compliance, operations, globalization and manageability.  Our focus is on smart growth, high efficiency and delivering a trusted experience to customers and partners worldwide.  We are looking for a passionate, high energy individual to help build the network that powers the world’s largest online services

Roles and Responsibilities:
In the Manufacturing Test Engineering roll, you will develop and sustain test hardware and software to support the verification of product functionality following the assembly process of PCBAs, storage enclosures, and racked assemblies within the ODM & Contract Manufacturer sites. 

Responsibilities

• Develop and provide test strategies in support of PCBA product development. Identify best testing methodology based on PCBA complexity and facilitate implementation
• Develop and provide test strategy and solution in support of enclosure and rack level testing at CM integration sites.
• Develop and maintain product test procedures and requirements
• Work with CM site to develop and implement testing documentation in support of the production processes.
• Provide support for hardware, software, and product configuration issues. 
• Ensure support test fixtures and testing equipment is maintained with current software revisions
• Understand and monitor CM capacity and capability constraints against forecast
• Monitor weekly production yield data for test and product issues while implementing continuous test enhancements to ensure quality of product
job_lists.other_condition:
• MUST have either ONE of below experiences:
A) 3+ years of work experience in manufacturing test at contract manufacturing site.
B) 2+ years of factory test diagnostic tool development experience. 
C) 3+ yeas on script languages development experience, such as shell script or Python.
• Bachelors in Computer Science, electronic technology, or related field.
• Engineering basic knowledge: electrical, software.
• Working knowledge of computer subsystems, component interfaces, add-on boards, electronic test equipment.
• Understanding of the complete design and manufacturing process at the PCBA and enclosure level with experience developing business (cost/ tradeoff) analyses
• Ability to communicate effectively and professionally across a range of technical disciplines. 
• Proficient in all MS Office applications. 
• MUST be willing to travel

job_lists.title: Sr. Front-end Engineering Manager
job_lists.company: Mozilla_美商謀智股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for a senior front-end engineering manager to lead Taipei front-end engineering teams to contribute in realizing Mozilla’s strategic vision for the internet. In this role, you are not only a hands-on leader who is able to provide technical feedback on projects you are responsible for, but also a manager who help your teams on reaching their goals by providing support and career development.

As the Sr. Front-end Engineering Manager at Mozilla, you will…
- Lead web frontend development team and android app development team
- Apply expert subject matter knowledge to manage staff activities in solving most complex business/technical issues within established policies.
- Advise senior management on the development of overall policies and long-term goals of the organization.
- Set clear expectations for your group, set goals, deliver results, and hold your team accountable for them.
- Anticipate and address issues within the team around communication, performance, team interpersonal dynamics, and unclear ownership swiftly and directly.
- Build resource plans that anticipate future needs, and work with management peers to ensure we're investing our resources wisely across the entire group
- Manage your team's healthy work attitude and ethics, and find creative ways to make them more effective.

About Mozilla
Mozilla exists to build the Internet as a public resource accessible to all because we believe that open and free is better than closed and controlled. When you work at Mozilla, you give yourself a chance to make a difference in the lives of Web users everywhere. And you give us a chance to make a difference in your life every single day. Join us to work on the Web as the platform and help create more opportunity and innovation for everyone online.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

- 10 years of experience in software engineering, with at least 4 years of people management experience.

- Experience effectively leading and shipping software projects at scale.
- Proficiency with software development practices for issue triage, prioritization, and execution.
- Ability to take the initiative to lead your team to success.
- The ability to communicate effectively within multiple teams.

job_lists.content: 【 歡迎應屆研發替代役加入我們團隊! 】一同拓展與大型企業的合作視野，帶領台灣中小企業邁向國際市場。久大行銷-APP研發團隊具備許多大型企業合作經驗，現在，就等著您的加入!我們將肩並肩打造企業的國際殺手級應用，一同站在企業巨人肩膀上進軍國際市場，改變台灣中小企業於世界的新利基，集技術和豐富經驗一身的專業團隊!【必備】1.熟悉Android程序設計、Framework結構 2.熟悉Andorid SDK及框架原理，精通Android組件使用 3.熟悉Android網絡通信機制，JSON數據傳遞，流媒體串流 4.參與團隊的研發及討論，主動提出問題與擁有團隊一體概念(極重要)5.持續優化App的品質與效能，並隨時根據Android開發者更新進行優化改版6.團隊必備工具，需具備bitbucket版本控管能力7.充滿無限熱情，要懂得愛App、心繫App，相信App可以幫助客戶改善問題8.有一顆學習新知的心，樂於分享、致力肩並肩突破傳統思維9.不逃避態度，碰到困難時需認真看待，盡力解決問題10.團隊不是一枝獨秀，請以團隊為出發點，一同肩並肩達成任務【加分區】1.會使用android單元測試、熟悉gradle2.龜毛個性，能寫出乾淨、穩定的程式碼。3.具有使用文件紀錄開發過程的習慣尤佳。4.對UI/UX有想法、有概念者尤佳。5.了解iOS與Android開發和介面差異性尤佳。6.已有上架App作品尤佳，請檢附作品或相關文件，並於面試時大展身手介紹。歡迎全省有志菁英加入久大資訊團隊.請立即連結：科技軟實力久大-傳產透過科技行銷全世界 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e4DaIdFe8r0科技軟實力行銷新突破！APP.動型錄打破傳統思維【久大行銷】https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=329rZKhBwjQ

job_lists.content:
1.配合集團資訊化之需求，規劃合適之解決方案，協助整體資訊之發展與應用。
2.管理軟體開發專案之流程（如：前置規劃、流程分析、解決方案評估、系統分析、系統設計、系統開發、資料驗證、系統測試、使用者測試）。

2.必備能力：需熟悉.Net程式語言撰寫(ASP.NET,C#.NET,JQuery,Json,Html5,Css等)。

5.具備良好溝通、表達能力及問題解決能力，主動積極解決問題，協助團隊成長。

job_lists.title: Software Product Planner
job_lists.company: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Gogoro is helping to create a more intelligent and adaptive system for today's most dynamic cities through electric energy, working toward a better future by putting power in the hands of consumers around the world. Product Team aim to develop and enrich smart energy system platform. We have successfully created a network to help nearly 15,000 clients enjoy a clean and playful life experience.
Role:
• Develop and deliver product based on users, data analysis, feedback collection, and iterative scientific experimentation
• Product roadmap planning and feature / requirement specifications (12-18 months)
 Software for products on market
 Software for customer facing tools
 Software for ecosystem

Responsibilities: (Accountability & Authority)
• Proposition development to define our customer, our product, and how we define / design success
• Working on a day-to-day basis with the broader Gogoro team (design, development, testing, operations, analytics, marketing, etc.) to ensure that we deliver products that create real value, that users love to tell their friends about, and that drive Gogoro's business forward
English resume is required.
job_lists.other_condition:
• 5+ years of experience in product management and/or product planning 
• Experienced in taking rough requirements, work with various software teams and product management teams to distill the strategy into actionable plans, follow by solid executional skills to launch products
• See the big picture, its relevant elements, and understand the value of software in the overall ecosystem
• Comfort communicating in English

job_lists.title: Firmware Architect/Manager/Director

job_lists.title: NAND Flash Application Manager/Leader (NVM System)
job_lists.company: 台灣卓榮集成電路科技有限公司
job_lists.content: Function: The NAND Flash Application Manager will lead a young and energetic engineering team, responsible for NAND specs, features, command sequences, characterization, and NAND failure analysis for state-of-art SSD architecture. This position will require reading and understanding flash specs from multiple vendors and interpreting them to determine the best sequences and algorithms to use. He/she also need to maintain a complete media matrix with all different parameters, (e.g. timing, power, physical data....etc) which tracks any change from NAND vendors. The matrix will be used by SSD development team as bible to design state-of-the-art system. The leader also need to apply his/her detail understanding of NAND flash physics, MLC/TLC technology and protocols to come out algorithm for endurance and reliability improvement. He/she will work on flash management system test plan for operation and drive NAND FA processes.
job_lists.other_condition:
Qualifications
. Requires a minimum of a MSEE or related degree, plus 5 years NAND memory system experience.
. Good hands on working knowledge of flash technology and NAND management of integrating 3D TLC into SSD systems.
. Experience of debugging and solving flash problems in complex flash management systems.
. Experience of creating, evaluating FA on flash devices.
. Good knowledge of 2D MLC and 3D NAND flash physics.
. Must be able to work with other development teams crossing different countries.
. Excellent written, verbal communications and presentation skills.

job_lists.title: Software Developer Manager

job_lists.content: What you'll do in Positive Grid:1.Provide the required hands-on software development and project management, cross-functional coordination, and inter/intra team communications to deliver outstanding product outcomes.2.Work closely with software engineers, QA, product managers, support manager and other engineering teams to get high-quality products and features through the software project lifecycle (build, test and release on time).3.Take responsibility for release schedules and milestones, keeping up a high velocity in a fast-paced environment.4.Work with HR to recruit talent team members. Building a vision of team skill sets, identifying key growth areas, managing hiring pipeline.5.Set the team objectives with director, and then define objectives for each team member and follow up to achieve team objectives. 6.Create a positive work environment based on accountability, in collaboration with the engineering and management teams.7.Acting as a role model, aiding in career development conversations, inspiring engineers, providing feedback.8.Providing technical suggestions to engineers as they grow into engineering leaders in their product work.9.Acting as a curator of a vision, discussing needs with stakeholders, prioritizing, driving forward on key initiatives, running scrum meetings.10.Investigating interpersonal issues, facilitating crucial conversations.11.Evangelize our products and our culture internally and externally.Minimum qualifications:1.3+ years experience in leading software development team of 5+ engineers in iOS, Mac or Windows platform. 2.Proven ability to recruit top talent.3.Demonstrated capability as a leader of people and technologies, taking new products from conception to volume production.4.Familiar with scrum process. 5.Proven “out of the box thinker” mentality, managing innovative product risk while balancing the road map for on time deliverables.6.Strong relationship management, strategy development, project management, problem solving and change management skills.7.Strong foundation of engineering competency, with a passion for excellence.8.Ability to think creatively to come up with new, valuable approaches.9.Demonstrate passion, great communication skills and commitment to help bring great new technologies to the world.Why you'll love working at Positive GridFast-paced environment with great growth opportunitiesAbility to create a product from the ground upPassionate, collaborative team membersStrong company culture including weekly company meeting, weekly gathering

job_lists.title: Computer Vision Scientist with PhD degree
job_lists.company: Viscovery_創意引晴股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
亞洲影像辨識先驅Viscovery現正招募中！
只要你符合以下條件，自認學習力強、願意接受挑戰，Viscovery歡迎你的加入！

Responsibilities
· Perform research to make reinforcement learning more applicable to                     real world problems.
· Provide research consultancy on applied projects: determine the scope
  of the problem, the best place to apply machine learning, and                               evaluate different approaches.
· Interface with product teams to identify potential new problem areas                     for future projects.
· Integrate new fundamental research ideas into applied projects.
· Collaborate with Software Engineers to design and run experiments,                    including designing and evaluating new algorithms as well as                               implementing known algorithms.
· Report and present experimental results and research findings clearly
  and efficiently, both internally and externally.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Viscovery是亞洲影像辨識軟體公司的先驅，我們的足跡遍佈台灣、上海、北京和新加坡，現在正在尋找有共同願景的夥伴加入我們的團隊！
我們要讓世界看到台灣的軟體實力，只要你學習力強、有能力，歡迎你一起和我們在世界的舞台發光發熱！
As Asia's pioneering Visual recognition software company, Viscovery have partners all over Asia - Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing and Singapore.
Now we're looking for people who share our vision, who is seeking for challenges and is not afraid of changes. Take this opportunity, be part of us!
Be Vibrant, be Visionary, be Viscovery!

我們工作環境輕鬆卻不失專注，努力中也少不了歡笑，希望所有人一同成長茁壯是公司的主旨。
 
如果看完上文讓你熱血沸騰，而你又是一位有3-4年前端開發師正想轉換成專案經理，或是一位有前端開發經驗的專案經理請不要猶豫馬上聯絡我們！
 
工作內容涵括前端的設計與客戶的溝通以及與行銷部門密切合作，會有許多機會可以了解網路行銷、網站優化等知識。若你原本就是專案經理絕對是加分條件，但切記絕不是必要之條件，我們最在乎的莫過於個人特質，我們相信經驗上的不足可透過學習來彌補，只要是對的人才，公司絕對願意栽培的！
 
薪資5-7萬
 
工作內容：
需與業務/企劃人員及程式設計等相關人員配合，溝通執行專案
具備 Javascript/jQuery 等前端技術
需會繪製 Wireframe 及 Sitemap
熟悉 Photoshop/Illustrator；Axure 或 Sketch
 
應要條件：
具英文書信、口語溝通能力
人格特質、人格特質、人格特質！
熟悉響應式設計（Responsive Web Design
熟悉行動裝置網站設計
熟悉跨瀏覽器網頁相容性
具備 UI/UX 使用者經驗知識
 
加分項目：
具備 mysql/php 等 候端基礎知識
具備 SEO 觀念
Wordpress

job_lists.title: NO.C265313J002/軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 104China代企業徵聘人才
job_lists.content:
公司介紹：
公司長期致力於為客戶提供單機自動化設備、自動化生產線、智能工廠的整體解決方案以及工裝夾（治）具等產品。針對不同行業的需求，整合運動控制、影像處理、鐳射量測、機械手、 精密貼裝和精密壓合等技術，配合軟件系統開發為客戶提供最具 競爭力的產品和服務。
公司業務涵蓋消費類電子、汽車、家電以 及日用品、化妝品、醫療品與食品領域。
目前，公司已經在中國總部、蘇州、深圳，美國及德國設 立5 個研發中心，並在全球範圍內設立了11個分公司，擁有 700 多名研發工程師。截至2015 年，已向國家知識產權 局申報專利1889 件，位居自動化行業前列。

職責說明：
1. 設計開發代碼、測試調試軟件系統；
2. 編寫GUI代碼，根據硬件設計測試代碼；
3. 不斷優化，提升軟件系統的效率和穩定性。


資格要求：
1. 有製造生產型產業工作經驗或工業自動化領域經驗
2. 非標自動化設備3年軟件開發經驗，熟練使用C#/C++編程
3. 熟練使用C#/C++語言編程


其他要求
1. 大陸經驗：不限
2. 科系背景：資訊工程、機械工程相關
3. 學歷：大學以上

薪酬福利
1. 免費食宿
2. 交通補貼
3. 國定假日+帶薪年假
4. 公司年度旅遊
5. 公司年度體檢 

若您在投遞履歷後的30天內未接到本公司的任何電話/郵件形式的面試通知，確定您暫時不符合此職位要求，還望海涵。

代徵企業介紹：
關於ComStar
ComStar由境外公司與大陸公司合資成立，是人民幣資金交易風險管理的最大系統供應商，也是以應用託管模式進行交易前中後風險管理的全球領先FinTech服務商。客戶自主研發的ComStar軟體協助中國上百家金融機構管理關鍵資金風控環節，包括政策性銀行、四大商業銀行、股份制銀行、城商行、外資銀行、農商行、農信社、農合社、券商和財務公司。作為人民幣資金市場的科技引導者，ComStar通過創新性的SaaS雲服務託管模式實現與全國性集中交易平臺的無縫連結，保障安全高效的本外幣、前中後一體化直通式處理，對人民幣資金市場50%以上的交易進行有效風險管控。客戶總部位於上海陸家嘴，在上海張江、北京、廣州、廈門、成都和臺北均設辦公室。

為何加入ComStar
是否想真正的參與中國人民幣國際化這一有意義的歷史進程？
是否想瞭解中國債券、外匯、理財交易的domain knowhow和FinTech服務模式？
是否想和技術先趨一起挑戰High Competitive模式開發發掘自己的潛能？
是否想體驗國際金融中心上海和臺北的雙城SMART工作生活？
如果你不想錯過FinTech新科技、熱愛解決問題、不怕壓力挑戰，無論您是剛畢業或是有開發經驗，請加入我們！

ComStar為您提供
行業前景：央行批准設立的金融科技企業，金融科技時代交易風險管理軟體的研發，唯一實現人民幣外幣、前中後一體化直通式處理的解決方案。
專業團隊：技術團隊由前彭博合夥人帶隊，產品團隊由來自四大會計師事務所的資深專家領軍，銷售團隊則由在中國耕耘十數年的前路透社王牌銷售掌舵，工作夥伴們不乏來自臺灣的開發前輩和大陸名校, 海歸, A咖。
個人發展：公司成立五年，客戶快速擴張超過130家，FINTECH 年度用戶費關已經邁入台幣十億RMB二億大關，你可以在國際金融中心上海感受大陸銀行間市場的波濤壯闊，拒絕「小確幸」。
薪酬福利：具有競爭力的薪酬，帶薪年假，探親和住房補助，補充商業醫療保險，免費年度體檢，你還可以選擇Base在上海或者臺北。
員工培訓：對新人提供定製化培訓和培養計畫，不限於技術培訓和帶教，還有外匯交易和本幣市場的深度課程，讓你成為懂業務的技術達人！
員工活動：不定期旅遊和踏青燒烤，籃球、足球、羽毛球、跑步小組陪你適應大陸的工作生活，讓你享受快樂的工作同時健壯體魄！

job_lists.company: 104China代企業徵聘人才
job_lists.content:
行業類別：金融業

在上海培訓3～6個月

資格要求
1.職務經驗：3年以上相關工作經驗，熟悉 C/C++ 開發經驗，Oracle數據庫開發經驗；
2.產業經驗：金融業相關
3.大陸經驗：不限
4.其他要求：
-瞭解銀行資金業務或擁有相關工作經驗優先考慮；
-熟悉Linux/Unix環境，包括shell script優先考慮；
-有產品細節設計、代碼模組化設計、和系統框架搭建經驗者優先考慮；　
-具備Oracle資料庫SQL調優經驗者優先；
-自我驅動、勇於承受壓力和挑戰；
-具有創造性和獨立邏輯思考能力；
-遵守團體紀律，善於溝通，有團隊精神；

背景要求
5.學歷：大學、碩士
6.科系：資訊工程相關、資訊管理相關
7.語言：不限

薪酬福利
8.基本月薪：最終薪資由企業方根據面試情況而訂。
9.福利補貼：最終福利由企業方根據面試情況而訂。

工作職責：
- PL/SQL C/C++高品質代碼編寫；
- 在敏捷團隊中作為開發者推進專案；

- 目標導向，能分辨專案中的優先順序，並如期交付；
- 在某些工作中可以獨當一面，做出有影響力的工作；

溫馨提示:若您在投遞簡歷後的30天未接到/收到本公司的任何電話/郵件形式的面試通知，確定您暫時不符合本公司的職位要求，還望海涵。

V-Consultants will join project teams to work on project assignments at customer sites. To deliver a complete solution to customers as the end goal, team members will be involved in end-to-end project delivery cycle, from requirement confirmation, system analysis, system design, development, test and deployment. All cycles involve customer interactions, team work, presentation, reporting, documentation, and etc. on top of technical tasks. From personal perspective, this is a highly challenging job nature which helps accelerate professional growth and personal values.

job_lists.title: AI Computer Vision Engineer
job_lists.company: 富凱禾股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are a startup company incubated from UT Texas AI Lab, and founded by EV automotive for driving next generation vehicle intelligence. The company is specifically developing deep learning and image processing algorithm/technology in 1) Perceptual sensing area including advanced eye tracking, facial recognition, dynamic gesture, and drowsiness detection; 2) HMI & Image Processing including holographic 3D, UI/VFX design and rendering; 3) ADAS signal processing and sensor fusion; and 4) Application software for embedded system and data link with vehicle ECU, T-box, and mobile Apps.

Job requirement:
‧ The position involves researching, implementing, and productizing solutions for intelligent vehicles specifically for category 1) Perceptual sensing and 2) HMI & Image Processing.
‧ Work with system hardware team in optimizing code into linux based embedded system.

Qualifications:
1. At least Master degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or equivalent.
2. Strong knowledge and experience of Computer Vision and Deep Learning algorithms.
3. Hands on experience with one or more deep learning frameworks such as Caffe, TensorFlow, Theano, or Torch.
4. Strong knowledge of object recognition and tracking, motion recognition, depth sensing, and 3D modeling, or image/video processing.
5. Good mastery of C/C++ and Python.

薪資(保證最低年薪): 800k - 1.5M by 14 months 
公司分紅與獎金: Cash bonus plus RSU share plan depending on performance

job_lists.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job_lists.company: 準訊生醫股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Summary
使用機器學習演算法分析長天期心電圖訊號，並整合至心電圖分析軟體中

Responsibilities
1.設計/測試機器學習演算法以分析心電訊號
2.多變量臨床訊號分析
3.與軟體開發團隊與臨床團隊共同整合機器學習演算法至分析軟體中

Required Qualifications
1.碩士/博士: 專精於電腦科學、電子電機、統計學領域
2.精通機器學習演算法、時間序列分析、統計模型分析
3.Basic knowledge of signal processing concepts like filtering, Fourier and wavelet transforms
4.具訊號處理基本知識如濾波、Z轉換、傅利葉轉換、小波傳換。
5.具Matlab/ C++語言能力，通一般資料結構與演算法。
6.曾有現實中帶雜訊之訊號處理經驗，可標定雜訊區
7.於機器學習領域可獨立做業

job_lists.title: Tech Lead, Frontend WEB Development (Full Stack)
job_lists.company: CatchPlay_英屬蓋曼群島商威望國際娛樂股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
CATCHPLAY is looking for an experienced WEB Frontend Tech Lead to combine the art of user experience with the art of programming in delivering our on-demand movie streaming service. 

If you are passionate about new web technologies, application performance, user satisfaction, and engineering best practices, this might be a right role for you. 

Responsibilities
1. Collaborate with product owner or key stake holders to scope product roadmap and technical development
2. Take ownership of frontend task breakdown and ensure they are rigorous and accurate for team collaboration
3. Educate the team and be an advocate for best engineering practices
4. Be ready to dive into issues and provide solutions related to backend collaborations
5. Collaborate with QA manager to ensure QA process is adhered to
6. Leads and mentor the team to establish strong team rapport as well as team performance
7. Achieve technical and strategic objectives for new web development e.g. PWA, Web-based TV APP, Integration with Android instant APP
8. Contributes to the open source community and may engage in speaking events
job_lists.other_condition:
Experience
1. 10+ years experience in software engineering
2. 3+ years experience with frontend development focus
3. Champion the stack: Webpack, ES7, React, Flux, Redux
4. Advanced level of hands on skills on HTML5, Java Script, CSS3, Less and SASS
5. Good knowledge of development operations from software integration, infrastructure changes to deployment. 
6. Have kept pace with trending frameworks, tools and libraries and have discipline to know when to adopt a new technologies and when to let them mature
7. Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them (e.g. including Facebook browser)
8. Strong experience in quality management and performance testing
9. Good knowledge of SEO principles and ensure application stay adhere to them

Tools Requirements
Webpack, ES7, React, Flux, Redux, HTML5, Java Script, CSS3, Less and SASS

job_lists.title: iOS APP Engineering Head
job_lists.company: CatchPlay_英屬蓋曼群島商威望國際娛樂股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content: 工作內容:1.負責主要產品 CATCHPLAY 前端App的開發與維護，用 Scrum 的方式來追蹤進度，每兩週推出新版本2.用 Jira 和 Github 來追蹤開發狀況，並用 TestFlight or Fabric.io 部署新app（如果有更適合的工具我們也都樂意嘗試）3.撰寫 Unit/Integration Test Cases（單元及整合測試），我們很重視軟體的穩定度並用fabric.io追蹤4.不只是接收別人給的 spec/requests，也能一起參與產品構想與開發討論5.與其他後台工程師們密切合作，包含後端伺服器的 API 串接及演算法函式庫的整合6.與其他公司夥伴合作，體驗及測試各式各樣的 API 和 SDK。7.各種新想法與技術的探索，除了 CATCHPLAY App的正常功能以外，也歡迎一起快速開發各種Growth Hacking 的功能，測試新市場機會～8.領導我們年輕有活力的前端 Mobile工程師團隊！必需條件:1.喜歡強化程式架構，研究開發工具，改善開發流程2.擁有 iOS 開發實務經驗3.熟悉 Swift, Git, Object-C, RESTful API, Networking, Multithreading 以及各種基本的資料結構4.熟悉 iOS UI 設計 (包含 Apple iOS Human Interface Guidelines 和能實作出各種實用的介面）5.非常在乎使用者經驗及App的品質6.能夠有效率地解決iOS裝置產生的 Bugs7.能夠幫團隊出聲，幫團隊成長8.有討論API Spec的豐富經驗
job_lists.other_condition: 加分條件:1.有自己的 Side project，已上架作品或者自己出品的 iOS Library2.有強化程式架構，研究開發工具，改善開發流程的經驗3.有調校 iOS App Performance 的經驗4.iOS 中毒，每年都會把WWDC的相關影片看完一遍5.曾經追 Bug 追到 SDK Framework 裡 6.幫自己的產品導入 Test Case，甚至採用 TDD開發流程7.玩過Apple tvOS開發 8.喜歡玩Android App 9.喜歡看電影

job_lists.company: CatchPlay_英屬蓋曼群島商威望國際娛樂股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
工作內容
This job will manage technical requirements for VOD Platform, and activities include following:
-Elicit business needs and stakeholder expectation. Translate them to user stories, functional requirements, acceptance criteria and other documentation.
-Collaborate with business owners, developers, QA, partners and business users.
-Participate in UAT to verify and validate if business needs are fulfilled. 
-Prepare user manuals and conduct training for the business users to ensure clear and better understanding of the system.
-Handle feature requests. Identify and document potential needs for system and process improvement.
-Works with Technical and refine current business processes against specific business objectives.

*工作內容
1. 線上影音平台開發及相關前後台的串接設計
2. 系統分析與Server API設計
3. 工作分派與資源協調
4. 跨團隊合作，例如：需求單位、協助前端、其他技術團隊等等
5. 技術文件撰寫
6. 帶領團隊完成開發與交付
job_lists.other_condition:
Required Skills / Experience 
1. At least 2 years experience in business/systems analysis role
2. Analytical, organized, and with strong problem solving skills. Experience in applying different business analysis techniques. For example, user interview, flow charting, prototyping, wireframe, use case diagram, cause/effect analysis, activity diagram, robustness diagram, and so on. 
3. Advanced skills using office productivity software tools (Google Docs, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Visio, etc) for professional documentation. Excel Pivot Table is a plus. 
4. Able to understand API documents, software architecture, and translate them to business benefits.
5. Able to work independently and with a team
6. Good oral and written communication skills. Able to speak and demo in Chinese and English is a plus. 
* Great to have following experience or skills
1. 具Agile, Scrum, Kanban, DevOps或其他漸進式開發流程(Incremental Development Process)經驗，加分

* Skills / Experience 
1. 具Java或Web程式開發經驗
2. 具RESTful API設計經驗
3. 具物件導向及設計模式觀念 
4. 具英文聽說讀寫能力
5. 具團隊合作及良好溝通能力
6. 具帶領3~5位開發人員之經驗
7. 能夠以flowchart, use case diagram, activity diagram, robustness diagram, sequence diagram 等等工具來表達設計概念
* Great to have following experience or skills
1. 具Agile, Scrum, Kanban, DevOps或其他漸進式開發流程(Incremental Development Process)經驗

job_lists.title: Sr. Product Analytics Manager  /  Product Analytics Manager
job_lists.company: CatchPlay_英屬蓋曼群島商威望國際娛樂股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Do you have a passion for digging deep into user data to deliver new insights that can impact millions of customers? We are looking for an outstanding experienced product analytics manager to join our product team, and shape customer experiences across mobile, tablet, desktop and big screen devices.

CATCHPLAY ON DEMAND Product Team is responsible for creating software products and services that enable customers to enjoy our online streaming services every day in the digital space, think WEB/m-WEB, iOS/Android APPs, TV/Set-top BOX and so on.

You will define and enhance products by leveraging your data insight talent that allow our customers to enjoy our movie content and services. This role demands a relentless focus on the customer data insight, understanding their needs, and ability to create valuable products and services that meet those needs, and create business value.

Responsibilities
•Lead product analytics and consumer data insight across devices
•Use best practices to leverage data from third party tools (e.g. Google Analytics, MixPanel) and the internal Business Intelligence tools and measure consumer online and mobile analytics
•Manage product key metrics dashboard and engage with product owners and business leaders in the markets to understand our business goals and customer's needs in next level ·      
•Analyze users' funnels, segmentation and preferences, and feedback insights into design, development, growth hacking, optimization of A/B Testing and prioritization of enhancement activities
•Work with the product owners on the development of product dashboards to be used effectively by management team and product committee members.
•Evaluate potential product solutions considering business (viability), technical (feasibility) and consumer (desirability) factors
•Capture product solutions in the form of user stories in the product backlog
•Work with the design team to define and capture product design and requirements that the engineering team will use to enhance the product


What we are looking for:
•5+ years of experience in online product/service, in particular managing high-traffic e-commerce, entertainment, lifestyle web or mobile consumer applications
•3+ years of work experience in product analytics or Business Intelligence and with combinationation of project management
•Hand-on and very familiar with data analytics and user engagement measurement tools (i.e. Google Analytics, MixPanel and etc.)
•Demonstrated experience in applying data driven insight with appreciation for great product user experience to create values for consumer products and impact business results
•Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced environment while managing competing priorities
•Strong collaboration and communication skills
•Attention to detail, self-motivated, and focused and results-oriented, but also creative and energetic
•Bachelor's Degree in business, economics, applied mathematics, statistics or related field, advanced degree in relevant field preferred
job_lists.other_condition:
The candidate with following experience is appreciated: 
•Deep understanding of statistics, customer profiling and segmentations, including SQL and other statistical analysis or business intelligence software
•Experience working with statistical methods typical for analytics packages a plus (i.e. SPSS, Statistical or similar)
•Experience working with Agile software development team and rapid product iteration with data insight inputs
•Experience with Growth project

job_lists.title: 客戶經理
job_lists.company: 數字雲端有限公司
job_lists.content:
1.確保專案目標的實現，領導專案團隊準時、優質地完成全部工作
2.與客戶溝通，瞭解專案的整體需求。並與客戶保持一定的聯繫，即時回饋階段性的成果，和即時更改客戶提出的合理需求。
3.制定項目開發計畫文檔，量化任務，並合理分配給相應的人員。
4.跟蹤專案的進度，協調專案組成員之間的合作。
5.監督產生專案進展各階段的文檔，並與QA即時溝通，保證文檔的完整和規範。
6.開發過程中的需求變更，專案經理需要跟客戶瞭解需求，在無法判斷新的需求對專案的整理影響程度的情況下，需同專案組成員商量，最後決定是否接收客戶的需求，然後再跟客戶協商。確定要變更需求的情況下，需產生需求變更文檔，更改開發計畫，通知QA。
7.專案提交測試後，專案經理需瞭解測試結果，根據測試的bug的嚴重程度來重新更改開發計畫。
8.向上彙報。向上級彙報專案的進展情況，需求變更等所有專案資訊。
9.專案完成的時候需要專案總結，產生專案總結文檔。

job_lists.title: [浪潮信息]自動化測試框架開發高級工程師(月薪10萬-20萬)

job_lists.content:

7. 具備x86伺服器或記憶體自動化測試開發經驗者尤佳。

job_lists.content: 本職務主要負責 NAS 各式硬體平台移植及 Linux/FreeBSD 新功能開發維護及效能調校, 本職務須具備高度自我管理能力, 能針對產品開發需求大量閱讀 protocol specification, datasheet 及 Linux/FreeBSD source code 並進行必要的開發與設計驗證。相關職務內容包含:1. Bootloader 新功能開發維護。2. SOC Hardware Offload Engine Driver 新功能開發維護。3. Enclosure Management (i2C, GPIO, EC) Driver 新功能開發維護。4. Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) 移植及新功能開發維護。5. Linux Mutiple Device/Device Mapper 新功能開發維護及效能調校。6. Linux SCSI LLD/ATA Port Driver 新功能開發維護及效能調校。7. FreeBSD NTB/CAM driver 新功能開發維護及效能調校。7. Linux/FreeBSD Network/WIFI subsystem 新功能開發維護及效能調校。 8. NAS system profiling. 9. 工廠生產, 測試程式開發維護。10. 規劃、執行與維護量產的產品。11. 協助研發軟體新技術與新工具。DescriptionsThis position will be responsible for the new board bring up, Device Drivers, Kernel, new CPU architecture development/integration for QNAP Linux/FreeBSD Operating System.

job_lists.title: [MS] Consultant - Secure Infrastructure Team (Services 約聘人員)-105JP
job_lists.company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Secure Infrastructure team in Microsoft Enterprise Services Delivery is looking for a talented, passionate and experienced Consultant to join our team. This is a highly-visible role responsible for delivering projects throughout Asia, with primary focus on growing the business in China. Secure Infrastructure is the biggest of the five core technical domains that have been formed. We cover 20+ products including Azure Infrastructure, Windows Server, Windows Client, System Center, Hyper-V, VMM, Active Directory, Azure AD, Azure RMS, Devices & Application Management, CyberSecurity, Security & Identity, and etc.We are currently hiring Consultants in China with expertise in one or more of the above technologies. As Secure Infrastructure Consultant, your primary objective is to assist Microsoft customers designing or deploying parts of their Information Systems leveraging Server and Cloud technologies. A Consultant in Microsoft Services delivers technical solutions to customers allowing them to maximize their investment in Microsoft technology. Building upon solid IT project experience relative to their level, consultants will work to assist customers in: • The delivery of high quality engagements around Microsoft Secure Infrastructure technologies and products in diverse client environments. • Large scale, multi-site design, rollout and operational experience around core Microsoft Infrastructure components• Stabilizing developed solutions using Microsoft methodologies in complex customer environments. • The design and development of integrated solutions using the latest Microsoft products and technologies. • Understanding the relevant application development, infrastructure and operations implications of the developed solution.
job_lists.other_condition: The ideal candidate must have experience in the following areas:• Strong consulting background and in depth, hands on customer delivery experience with one or more Microsoft technologies and products, including Azure Infrastructure, Windows Server, Windows Client, System Center, Hyper-V, VMM, Active Directory, Azure AD, Azure RMS, Devices & Application Management, Cyber Security, Security & Identity. • Proven technical field experience in designing and deploying large scale, deployment and rollout, and operational experience in one or more technologies above • Good technical pre-sales skills such as professional services effort estimation, scoping workshops, working with Architects and partners to define WBS, roles and responsibilities • Field consulting experience, with large global Customers / Partners, on infrastructure architecture design, developing solution guidance and leading complex consulting engagements • Delivering consulting engagements, managing customer expectations Required Knowledge and Abilities • Communication skill in Mandarin and English. • Analytical Problem Solving • Building Customer/Partner Relationships • Confidence • Cross-Boundary Collaboration • Impact and Influence • Interpersonal Awareness • Product & Technology Expertise • Dealing with ambiguity Education, Training and Certifications • Must have a degree in Computer Science or Engineering, or equivalent work experience. • 3+ years of experience in IT system development or consulting • Work experience should involve technical consulting, development, and deployment. • Microsoft or other related industry certifications are a plus • Must have a proven record of delivering business value.

job_lists.title: [MS] Manufacturing Test Software Developer (MCIO 約聘人員)-105JP
job_lists.company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
This position is within Manufacturing Test team and will be working on servers and related PCBA products. 

Teams: Cloud and Enterprise

Overview:
Microsoft Cloud Infrastructure and Operations (MCIO) is the team behind Microsoft’s expanding Cloud Infrastructure and responsible for powering Microsoft’s “Cloud First” mission. MCIO is responsible for powering some of the world’s largest online services including over 200 Microsoft Online Services around the world with our server and data center infrastructure, security and compliance, operations, globalization, and manageability solutions. Our focus is on smart growth, high efficiency, and delivering a trusted experience to customers and partners worldwide and we are looking for passionate, high energy engineers to help achieve that mission. The Deployment Engineering and Operations (DE&O) team provides business services and operations that enable and support of Forecasting and Capacity Supply (FACS) functions. You will be instrumental in defining and delivering operational measures of success for hardware decommissioning, improving the planning process, quality, delivery, scale and sustainability related to the Decommissioning technology. We are looking for seasoned engineers with strong passion for customer focused solutions, insight and industry knowledge, and technical expertise who can envision and implement future technical solutions to manage and optimize Cloud infrastructure at scale.

Job Description:
This position will be providing Windows related development work for manufacturing test needs using a range of applicable technologies (e.g. programming languages, compilers, assemblers, debuggers etc.)
• The engineer will be responsible of the design, scripting and deployment of a Windows based Manufacturing Test software solutions. 
• The engineer will interface with technical contacts in Microsoft and its suppliers to resolve engineering issues pertaining to SW/OS/FW/HW.
• The ability to interact with technical providers to drive issues resolution, software structuring/ development in design phases, and influence the team to support new test feature, test coverage and functionalities;
• Concept and experience of software development life cycle and Agile SW methodology
• In-depth experience in developing automated test solutions using industrial PCs, from test methodology evaluation, vendor/product selection, test software development and final deployment 
• Familiarity with IPMI-based shelf-management in ATCA, including the implementation of Shelf Manager Ethernet Interface
• Senior technical skills, able to write well-designed, well-structured, testable, efficient code for mfg test;
• Re-write, re-compile and Integrate software components into a fully defined software package
• Interaction with suppliers on software integration interface and development 
• Work with cross-functional teams on defect management, FA data collection and resolutions
• Expertise in documenting manufacturing test related specifications/requirements, software development in different product stages
job_lists.other_condition:
• 5+ years of demonstrated experience in .NET framework, C#, with component extensions.
• 3+ years of experience in developing software that works with firmware, BIOS, device drivers, databases, systems, network, operating system, application administration, embedded software/firmware, tools and utilities. 
• Able to code/debug and guide others to code/debug flexible, scalable and complex programs, using either written or verbal design specifications. 
• Able to achieve mastery of new tools, languages and operating systems with some training and on-the-job experience. 
• Excellent analytical & debugging skills
• Familiarity with Software Development Life Cycle and Quality Control methodologies. Able to define and document how a specific technical requirement for software development will be implemented and to estimate development timeline given the resources info. 
• Able to participate and add value in all phases of software development: feasibility, design, implementation, integration, test and delivery.
• Graduate degree and 4-6 years relevant experience a plus

job_lists.title: 3011410 System Engineering Program Manager, Commercial Destktop [3~5年經驗]
job_lists.company: HP Inc._台灣惠普資訊科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for visionaries who are ready to make an impact on the way the world works. At HP, the future is yours to create!

Responsibilities: 
• Manages and leads a program involving one or more functions and project teams to drive the engineering development and implementation process for a subsystem or component of a product or service offering.
• Develops schedules, critical deliverables, budget, resource allocation plan, and other support requirements for assigned program.
• Coordinates activities of supporting project teams and internal and external development partners; tracks progress against established plan and makes decisions to alter or update schedule and resource allocation to meet product requirements and development schedule.
• Communicates program progress, escalations, and issue analysis to product stakeholders; collaborates with management and internal manufacturing and development partners to implement changes to product, process, or program plan to resolve escalated issues, produce solutions, and ensure adherence to budgets and established product roadmaps and schedules.
• Leads and provides guidance and mentoring to less-experienced staff members.
job_lists.other_condition:
Education and Experience Required: 
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business Management, Engineering, Computer Sciences, or equivalent.
• PMP/PMI certification preferred.
• Typically 4-6 years experience.

Knowledge and Skills: 
• Using project planning tools and software packages to create, manage, and track project results.
• Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
• Demonstrated experience coordinating and directing matrixed teams and resources.
• Ability to create and manage program schedules, budgets, and resource allocation plans.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills; mastery in English and local language.
• Ability to effectively communicate program plans, proposals, and results, and negotiate options at management levels.

job_lists.title: SSD HW Platform Firmware, Manager
job_lists.company: HGST昱科＿新加坡商昱科環球儲存股份有限公司 台灣分公司新竹營業所
job_lists.content:
Western Digital is seeking a platform firmware Manager to work in our Enterprise eSSD group. The manager will be responsible for:

Responsibilities:
• Leading a team chartered with platform diagnostic firmware development and execution. 
• Responsible for the specification, design, and implementation of platform diagnostic firmware for eSSD product. 
• Manages development diagnostic firmware activities, milestones, and deliverables.
• Manages, leads and develops people. Guides others toward shared goals, providing the development, coaching, feedback and resources to accomplish tasks.
• Co-works with the cross-functional team and helps to establish and maintain product diagnostic feature and timeline.

Requirements:
• BS/BA degree or equivalent with 12 or more years of related experience and 5 or more years of direct management experience.
• Ability to achieve results in a fast moving, dynamic environment.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including ability to communicate effectively in English for firmware engineers and peer engineering teams and partners.
• strong ability to analyze complex firmware and hardware issues
• Ability to scope and estimate development effort.
• ASIC, Flash, SATA/SAS/PCIe experience with embedded architecture required
• Proficient and comfortable with standard software development methodologies including source control systems and defect tracking systems. 
• Over 8 years in C programming, exposure to C++ a plus and debug skills with tools such as JTAG debugger, GDB and protocol analyzer.
• 2 years of prior experience with scripting languages for test automation (Perl, Python or similar).

job_lists.title: 資深串流工程師 (Senior Streaming Engineer)
job_lists.company: 愛卡拉互動媒體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Join StraaS engineering team and build cutting-edge a streaming platform that empowers content providers to deliver adaptive bitrate streaming to multiple devices. You’ll design and improve streaming pipelines, manage streaming services at scale, and as high availability as possible.

We're looking for strong candidates who will be dedicated to the server side, will share knowledge of media streaming, and will be happy to help our client-side products.

Responsibilities:
￭Design, build, and maintain StraaS live streaming services at enterprise level.
￭Measure and optimize streaming performance, latency, and quality at a deep level.
￭Provide technical expertise to troubleshoot both server-side and client-side streaming issues.

Requirements:
￭3+ years of experience with developing media streaming systems.
￭Be familiar with C/C++.
￭Experience with streaming protocols (e.g., RTMP/WebRTC/HLS/DASH).
￭Knowledge of codecs (H.264/VP8), and how to optimize in different use cases.
￭Knowledge of networking and experience dealing with network issues.
￭Be familiar with Linux development environment.
￭Be familiar with Git.
￭Be a strong communicator. Communication make an engineer great.

Pluses:
￭Experience with Node.js/Golang/Bash.
￭Experience with Gstreamer.
￭Experience with RESTful APIs.
￭Experience with cloud platform (e.g., GCP, AWS, Azure).
job_lists.other_condition:
￭擅長工具：詳見工作內容
￭工作技能：詳見工作內容

job_lists.title: 資深基礎建設工程師 (Senior Infrastructure Engineer)
job_lists.company: 愛卡拉互動媒體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
StraaS's infrastructure powers OTT solutions (streaming, messaging and advertising technology with best multi-screen and multi-device user experiences) for businesses all over the world. We help businesses integrate OTT solution into their products, build world-class developer-friendly APIs,  SDKs, and more. If you're an infrastructure engineer here, you'll get to build the systems that power our products.

You'll be on a team that maintains services we provide to the rest of engineering team, like resource scheduler or message queue. You'll make decisions with a significant impact on StraaS. There is a lot of work to do to make StraaS engineers' work easier and our platform even more reliable than it is today, and we'd love for you to be part of it. We're close to the customers using our systems, so we constantly get feedback that we can use to make them better.

We're looking for people with a strong background (or interest!) in systems. We'd love to hear from you whether you're a seasoned systems developer, or whether you've just learned you might like working with databases.

 You will
￭Design, build, and maintain the core infrastructure used by all of StraaS's engineering team
￭Debug production issues across services and levels of the stack
￭Build a great customer experience for people using your infrastructure

You may be a fit for this role if you:
It's not expected that any single candidate would have expertise across all of these areas. For instance, we have wonderful team members who are really focused on their customers' needs and building amazing user experiences, but didn't come in with as much systems knowledge

￭ Think about systems — their edge cases, failure modes, and lifecycles
￭ Know your way around a Unix system
￭ Focus on the needs of our users, both internal and external
￭ Are able to write high quality code in a programming language (Our main programming language is Golang, but it is not a must)
￭ Be familiar with cloud platform (e.g. GCP, AWS, Azure, etc...)
￭ Be familiar with container technology and relating CI/CD experiences based on it (eg. Docker, Kubernetes, etc...)

Projects you could work on:
We have a ton of important work to do, which is why we're hiring! Our projects are of course changing all the time, but here are a few projects that we're working on, so you can get an idea of the types of work we do. Technologies we use include: nginx, jenkins, docker, kubernetes, etcd, mysql, elasticsearch, influxdb, redis, mongodb, fluentd and others.

￭ Plan and implement multi-region availability for our messaging infrastructure! All of our systems can sustain losing machines, and making our systems even more resistant to failure is a big theme for us. If you like thinking about distributed systems, you might find a good home here!
￭ Distributed tracing! To make it easier for any StraaS engineer, when debugging, to trace a request from its source down to every service it touched.
￭ We have a bunch of projects around deploying and running code: help us instantly roll back bad deploys so that we can recover quickly, and build infrastructure that lets us scale up our API workers in seconds in response to high API load.
￭ Maintain and improve the in-house cloud resources scheduler to fulfill specific scaling policies which the cloud platform doesn't provide.
job_lists.other_condition:
￭ 擅長工具：詳見工作內容
￭ 工作技能：詳見工作內容

job_lists.title: 雲端技術導入顧問 (Cloud Service Technical Consultant)
job_lists.company: 愛卡拉互動媒體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
# 事業簡介
2017年 Google NEXT 大會宣布，越來越多大型網路公司加入 Google Cloud Platform（GCP） 雲端服務的行列，包含 Spotify、可口可樂、蘋果電腦等，無論是大型企業、網路公司甚至金融科技(Fintech)公司，都面臨了上雲端的轉捩點。
 
愛卡拉 (LIVEhouse.in) 優先取得 Google 最新人工智慧及雲端技術的權利，旗下企業旗艦級產品 StraaS.io 為網路影音技術及人工智慧技術 SaaS 平台。本身的直播服務完全經歷 IDC、AWS，最後移植到 GCP 的過程，從使用者的角度出發加上專業的技術團隊為您服務。目前由愛卡拉導入 GCP 的公司已超過 100 家、橫跨超過 10 種產業，包含遊戲、電商、數據廣告、IoT等。愛卡拉是 Google Cloud 頂級合作夥伴。
 
深耕網路雲端技術多年的影音直播團隊愛卡拉，正式宣佈成為 Google Cloud Platform (GCP) 全球 Premier Partner 頂級合作夥伴，與 Google 攜手推廣雲端業務，協助台灣及亞洲業者將服務上 Google 雲端。目標為「打造台灣成為亞太地區的雲端服務營運中心」。
 
# 產品或服務
Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

# 職務需求
1. 雲端相關領域 2 年以上經驗
2. 具有流暢的英文讀寫能力、學習意願強
3. 協助 GCP 售後支援服務導入、回報產品狀況與解決方案提供 
4. 具 Network、Storage、虛擬化與容器叢集技術領域經驗
5. 負責雲端 IaaS、PaaS 等專案建置規劃與技術支援


我們的全中文官方部落格：https://blog.gcp.expert/
非常歡迎各路英雄好漢一齊加入愛卡拉的專業團隊！
job_lists.other_condition:
＃具備以下條件尤佳： 
1. 已取得 GCP 認證者。 
2. 已取得 AWS Solutions Architect 認證者。
3. 熟悉 Azure、Microsoft Server、Microsoft SQL Server者。
4. 具有豐富雲端軟體開發或維運經驗者。

job_lists.content: The Software Engineering Manager / Architect is responsible for creating software architecture, managing the software development process, staffing the software engineering team, and allocating software engineering resources to meet the product development timelines. job_lists.title: Orbweb GTMT Technical Product Manager (產品技術經理/GoToMyThings)
job_lists.company: 雲動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Orbweb is developing a next-generation cloud-based IoT Devices Management solution that delivers IoT Device Management capabilities throughout distributed top channel operators. The Technical Product Manager (TPM) is the primary operational owner of Orbweb' line of cloud-based IoT Platform. The position requires day-to-day interaction with product management, including defining market requirements, product requirement documents and packaging the features into product releases. The TPM works closely with key customers, product architects and development, marketing, sales, and support to develop and manage new product releases and upgrades to customers. The TPM maintains the product road map, creates concept documents, business and use cases for new services, features and functions to support customer demands, growth strategies and profitability targets. Key responsibilities -Serve as primary product expert and evangelist, who is capable of articulating and demonstrating the important role Orbweb GTMT plays in an IoT environment. -Lead product design, development and release process for assigned products and maintain the product development road map -Coordinate the collection, description, analysis and prioritization of requests for new product functionality from customers and prospects -Create detailed use cases, business requirements, and marketing requirements -Support marketing, sales and support through leading the development and maintenance of various technical marketing collateral including application notes, FAQs, product notes, user guides, field training presentations, online marketing content and demos -Develop hands-on, in-depth knowledge of competitive products and maintain technical analysis of competitive strengths and weaknesses -Coordinate beta testing of new products and features. Document and report problems and recommend solutions/improvements to program managers. Participate in product performance benchmarking activities. -Leverage our partners to work on joint initiatives that showcase our technologies and solutions alongside our partner’s offerings. Additional responsibilities -Perform product demonstrations at trade shows, online seminars, and other events -Document answers to customer technical questions that cannot be answered by sales staff or product support specialists using existing documentation.
job_lists.other_condition: Qualifications - 5-7 years of product management and technical marketing experience for an infrastructure technology or enterprise software company - Strong technical networking background is required - Strong problem solving skills along with excellent verbal and written communication skills - Ability to effectively interface with customers - Must have experience with cross-functional teams that include engineering, sales, and marketing staff - Excellent listening, oral and written communication/presentation skills with strong ability to influence people at all levels and in various functions. - Demonstrated ability to successfully work across teams. - Must be able to demonstrate both a passion for technologies and solutions, and a strong aptitude for business strategy. - Willing to travel up to 25% in order evangelize Orbweb technologies and solutions with partners, customers and business leaders. - Exceptional people, presentation and written skills are a pre-requisite. - BS in Computer Science or related technical degree preferred, Masters of Science or MBA desirable.

job_lists.title: [MS] Project Manager (Microsoft Services 約聘人員)-105JP
job_lists.company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Are you passionate about using technology to solve some of the toughest problems facing the largest companies and government agencies around the world? Do you value the deployment of solutions into production with real world impact? Are you obsessive about the quality and consistency of the work you do in leading teams to deliver value and meeting the mission of customers? 

If so, the Project Manager position in the Microsoft Services Organization is for you! 

Part leader, part mentor, and part consultant, our team of Project Managers comprises a mix of project management and consulting skills, along with a passion for technology. We are responsible for keeping the project team working on the highest priority tasks, removing risks and impediments, and leading the communication with the end customer. We pride ourselves on our collaborative team culture, helping other team members to be successful, sharing our ideas and our work, and building upon others’ work. 

As a trusted advisor to our customers, you will be responsible for the successful execution of one or more projects at a time, providing guidance, coaching, and project leadership. By mentoring and influencing, you will drive the highest quality and the strongest sense of customer focus on each project. 

The Project Manager’s primary responsibilities include: 

• Leading one or more teams at a time to successfully deliver on customer solutions 
• Ensuring adherence to cost, schedule, and scope constraints by tracking budget and forecasts utilizing a formal Statement of Work (SOW) 
• Working with the customer to manage the scope of an engagement and make adjustments throughout the course of the engagement 
• Advocating adherence to industry standard processes 
• Providing actionable coaching feedback to team members to foster continuous improvement in the spirit of a growth mindset 
• Travel to customer sites will be required
job_lists.other_condition:
Relevant Characteristics and Experience for the Project Manager Role: 

• Certifications in Project Management (PMP or PRINCE2) with real world experience are preferred. 
• Demonstrated effectiveness in leading teams (when you lead, do people follow?) 
• Excellent Mandarin and English oral and written communication including strong executive presence at the CXO level 
• Broad understanding and experience with the Microsoft platform. Office 365 or related technologies, including core infrastructure, Active Directory, Cloud Identities, Exchange, SharePoint and Lync is an advantage 
• Ability to identify risks and to develop mitigation and avoidance strategies 
• Consulting experience preferred, but not required 
• The ability to quickly establish credibility and trust with customers and internal stakeholders, and influence them about the merits of the chosen approach
