job_lists.title: Software Development Manager
job_lists.company: 英屬開曼群島商易智能股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description:
AMPOS is looking for a Software Development Manager to build industry leading Enterprise 
Employee Relationship Management applications and services on our product platform.  There 
is no red-tape, political infighting or endless meetings here.  We move fast and have fun.  Your 
sole focus will be creating amazing software solutions for our customers in the Manufacturing 
and Hospitality industry to positively impact lives.
 
If you know how to build highly scalable, extensible platforms and applications 
we want to talk to you!

Responsibilities
  What will your day to day look like?
• Recruit, challenge, and reward high performance individuals that deliver 10x the impact 
of average engineers
• Provide leadership in iteratively defining & refining development processes as the team grows
• Work in an agile, small team environment within a highly successful Cloud company 
that is growing fast
• Directly collaborate with all product stakeholders and drive multiple features to successful delivery
• Be a trusted partner for senior management to determine best solutions, help drive 
alignment and implement decisions throughout your team 

    Qualities we value:
• Tenacity, technical brilliance and ability to contribute quickly
• Take pride in work through attention to detail
• Drive and flexibility to roll up your sleeves, work hard and have fun in a fast-moving environment
• Smart, quick learner, proactive, comfortable working with unknowns and dynamically 
evolving requirements
• Creativity and a self-starting willingness to explore new technologies

Qualifications 
• 2+ years of software engineering management experience using an agile development process
• 5+ years developing commercial software in Java
• Proven ability to hire, mentor, coach and lead a team to success

job_lists.title: 資訊管理部主管
job_lists.company: 力成科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
1. 對於日常作業所經辦之各項工作，需確實遵照公司各類作業程式(S.O.P.)規定作業，應盡最大努力對工作的表現做到能符合上級主管具體要求之標準進行自我要求與管理，並確實依據「主動、積極之原則，敬業、負責之態度」進行資訊專案管理、程式規格檔﹝Document﹞建立，審核與確認完善、程式編譯﹝Program Coding﹞，與 Coding 歷程建檔﹝Comments﹞，並確保完善，可被其他資訊程式工作者解讀與瞭解、程式維護、處理對於被指定之資訊服務需求單，並於限期內完成，並確保滿足高標準之有效率的工作流程，並確保作業過程、以及作業的結果，能被上級主管審核/稽核，並能通過審核/稽核。
2. 對於經辦之相關作業中，倘若發現有不尋常的現象，並有發生損害的可能性時，應主動瞭解問題，並立即向上級主管報告，並且對於事後發生實際損害時，能夠即時提出相關紀錄，並且對於明顯「應該知悉、預防、補救、與報告」，卻未採取有效動作之疏失負責。
3. 應掌握對於所負責管理各項專案之相關程式之規格檔﹝Document﹞，並確保所負責的各項專案之規格能在專案與程式編譯開始之前與內部、外部客戶進行需求確認，並具備不低於市場「資深經理級 / 資深顧問」等級之專業顧問之審查與管理能力，同時確保相關程式之編譯能完全滿足規格檔﹝Document﹞之要求。Document 的修改需與內部、外部客戶進行書面確認，並留存記錄﹝包括但不僅限於電子郵件方式為之﹞，以保障公司的權益與利益。應隨時確認專案的執行進度，在專案有逾期的風險時，需在逾期之前主動補救、協調內部、外部客戶與相關單位，並呈報上級，以降低損害，並盡最大努力趕上進度。
4. 對於所屬之所有的資訊服務需求申請單，應確保於 KPI 預定之目標時間內完成，並落實與提出需求申請者之溝通與使其確認驗收，對於相應之記錄﹝郵件、規格要求與討論﹞，完整的保管與存檔，確保可隨時針對問題，能夠及時提出完整的記錄。
5. 對於所屬工程師﹝Programmer﹞的日常程式負責程式品質把關﹝QC﹞、確定 IT 專業上應有的 SA / SD 都具體文件化﹝document﹞、與做成「容易被其他工程師﹝Programmer﹞解讀」之程式編譯、修改的歷程記錄書﹝comment﹞。
6. 須要能夠獨當一面負責執行與管理客戶的 B2B 自動化相關之專案，隨時因應公司需要，可以前赴國外客戶的工作處所出差，當場自己能獨立編譯、修改程式﹝coding﹞，或遠距指揮、督導我們公司內部的工程師﹝Programmer﹞編譯、修改程式。
7. 對於資訊技術相關專案，能有效率的解決問題，並及時向相關主管報告成果；如果作業中途發生瓶頸，應及時以電話或當面向主管報告，不得自做主張放任損害發生。
8. 應當責主導公司 自動化 相關專案，並對於資料庫﹝DataBank﹞之建置、維護與對使用者之溝通，以及教育訓練負責，避免使用者過度消耗公司之資訊管理人力資源，惟與公司其他單位 自動化相關 資訊服務需求申請者、使用者之溝通過程中不得招致「具體、合理之報怨」。
9. 對於各項重要工作相關績效進行統計，並即時提出精確、具有管理意義之統計報告。
10. 達成公司 KPI 之預設目標，對於未達標之專案，定期提出檢討報告與改善行動方案，並落實改善方案。

job_lists.title: DevOps Lead, Taiwan
job_lists.company: AylaNetworks_香港商艾拉物聯網路有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
We are an exciting start-up delivering a PaaS platform for the Internet of Things. The Ayla Platform™ is the industry’s only complete end-to-end solution for transforming everyday products into cloud-connected devices quickly, easily and economically.  Ayla combines its innovative and highly efficient technology with best-in-class hardware, applications, cloud-based services and digital information services to allow manufacturers to reinvent their products for the smartphone era.
 
We are looking for an exceptional DevOps leader to join the Ayla DevOps team.  You will be a key member of the team influencing the various services that manage devices, users and data. 


<What You Will Be Doing>
• Working in an engineering culture that is customer focused
• Managing a highly scalable and reliable systems for millions of devices and users
• Play a significant role and make an impact on the company’s success
• Lead Taiwan DevOps team & work with US peer to achieve diverse objectives in replicable, scalable ways.
• Work with US region DevOps leader, direct planning of long and short term infrastructure improvement projects & cost down strategy, including design, budgeting, and implementation.
job_lists.other_condition:
<Desired Skills and Experience>

• 8+ years industry experience supporting micro service applications, PaaS, or cloud technologies.
• 3+ years of experience leading an operations team following agile development processes. Stong leadership skills to convince and push change across the organization
• 3+ years deploying and operating applications in the cloud: AWS, GCE, Rackspace, OpenStack etc.; strong experience designing and managing fault tolerant web platforms with high scale & availability.
• 3+ years of experience in using any script (Ruby, Python or Bash) to automate server operations
• 3+ years of experience with administration of the following databases: MySQL, Cassandra, or other noSQL databases.
• 3+ years of experience in log collection and analysis, performance monitoring/tuning. Proven experience using logging and monitoring tools: New Relic, ELK, Nagios etc.
• Experience using CI/CD tools
• Strong understanding of DevOps principles/tools integration. Direct planning of long and short term infrastructure improvement projects, including design, budgeting, and implementation.
• Able to participate in 24/7 on-call rotation.

job_lists.title: 軟體專案經理( Project Manager )
job_lists.company: 薩摩亞商鳳之梧數位科技有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
必要條件：
1.熟悉軟體專案規劃、開發流程，具備軟體專案管理經驗。 
2.與客戶進行需求訪談，並進行需求分析、專案規劃及提案。
3.良好的溝通及協調能力。
4.規格文件的撰寫、維護。

加分條件：
團隊(三人以上)開發經驗。( 角色為RD而非PM )

鳳之梧是外商集團的子公司，旗下擁有許多公司資源，於世界各地都有我們的辦公駐點，此子公司著力研發線上遊戲，需要優秀的應用端開發工程師一起加入我們的團隊! 

職務的工作內容主要為網路即時資訊接收與傳遞, 多工資料分析處理, 即時警示系統設計, 
金流介接系統設計。

公司位在文化氣息濃厚的勤美誠品商圈，草悟道旁的地標 the one 高樓上，環境舒適，視野非常遼闊。

我們的成員幾乎都是年輕而優秀的夥伴，採用美式管理，這裡沒有僵硬的階級管理制度
同事之間大多都是平行的，我們極力創造一個良性競爭而可以互相學習的環境

如果你有優秀的能力，能夠團隊合作，有學習的熱誠，歡迎你加入我們的團隊!

job_lists.title: Lead Developer - Growth Engineering
job_lists.company: Nogle Taiwan Limited_諾傑股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are forming a new Growth Engineering team at Style.me to focus on 
improving our 3D scanning process and scalability of our virtual try-on 
platform. 
As the Lead Developer, you will drive the automation of various processes
and build software alongside and on top of our existing systems. You will
also get to work with advanced technology spanning computer graphics,
computer vision, physics-based simulation, and our US-patented 3D 
geometry modeling algorithms.
This is a position that will contribute tremendously to the success of our
product launches in the US and then globally. If you are a master 
software engineer that can navigate complex systems and solve problems
creatively, then we would love to talk to you.

Responsibilities:
- Lead a team of talented engineers to build tools for managing and 
scaling our 3D scanning process and our virtual try-on platform
- Be both a technical hands-on coder and people manager
- Work with the product teams to find the optimal way to scale our 
systems
- Provide technical leadership and guidance to your team and project 
peers
- Automate data validation, quality control, and client integration 
workflows
- Solve the hardest software performance issues: Work with software 
developers closely to improve code base performance (e.g. algorithm redesign) and shorten request latency
- Develop tools to monitor billions of try-ons: Write monitoring and 
reporting tools to do performance-related tests and analysis
- Identify bottleneck issues proactively and work with systems, network 
and engineering teams to discover resolutions
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements:
- BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Operations 
Research or other technical field
- 6+ years of software engineering experience using C++, Java, or Python
- 3+ years of experience leading software engineers
- Interpersonal and communication skills
- Experience working with cross-functional teams
- Experience in performance engineering
- Experience in using various libraries in machine learning and image 
processing

job_lists.title: IT- Business Intelligence Analyst
job_lists.company: 台灣美光記憶體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Learning business processes at a deep grain.
Designing rock-solid solutions that change the way business is done.
Collaborating with a diverse, global team.
Being recognized and rewarded for creative solutions.
Delivering results that matter. 

Sound like the right career for you. We’re hiring!

Job Description
As a Business Intelligence Analyst (BIA) in Information Technology you will work with cross functional teams, to create analytic capability, providing decision makers with actionable business intelligence. You will partner closely with Manufacturing, R&D, Engineering and IT functional teams to understand processes and systems to learn the data and craft solutions to solve problems. You will work with architects and engineers to model data that can deliver answers to business questions and fit within a strategic direction for architecture.  You will have the opportunity to work on strategic BI initiatives that are driven from Micron’s business strategy and have an immediate impact to customers.
job_lists.other_condition:
What we are looking for:
• 6+ years of relevant work experience in Business Intelligence
• A passion for data and information
• Strong analytical, problem solving and organizational skills
• Proficiency in reading and writing SQL queries
• Experience with various technologies, frameworks and processes, such as the Microsoft BI Suite, Tableau, Hadoop, data warehousing, data modeling, data flow mapping, requirements gathering, testing and data validation techniques.
• The ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced, work environment
• The ability to manage multiple projects and tasks concurrently
• Self-motivated with the ability to work under minimal supervision
• The ability to work both independently and on project teams
• A Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems / Information Technology, Computer Science, related fields of study or equivalent business experience
• Good communication skills in English or TOEIC 650 and above
• Based in Taichung 


Minimal travel required (2-3 international trips per year)

job_lists.company: 藝珂人事顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
1. This position will be responsible for Planning, developing, implementing, and maintaining the server, networking, and telecommunications environment locally and assist the corporate team with global operations. 
2. Act as a point of escalation for resolving network and server-related problems.  
3. Work closely with IT Technical Support personnel to ensure that effective communication and coordination is maintained.  
4. Assist in the development of long-term systems architecture, and help ensure that this architecture continues to meet the needs of the organization.  
5. Maintains computing environment by identifying network requirements; installing upgrades; monitoring network performance and troubleshooting network problems.  
6. Safeguard information system assets by identifying and solving potential and actual security problems.
RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Experience implementing network and server monitoring and disaster recovery/ Business Interruption plans
2. Manage a growing local IT team that may include developers/DBAs etc.
3. Maintain detailed documentation on all servers, systems, and networking items in region.
4. Plan and manage the implementation of complex infrastructure solutions.  Establish network specifications by conferring with users; analyzing workflow, access, information, and security requirements.  
5. Meet financial requirements by submitting information for budgets; monitoring expenses
6. Implement best practices that increase efficiencies and lower operational costs
7. Provide technical leadership.  Handle all escalations on for operations and infrastructure issues, and provides mentorship to junior members of the IT staff
8. Assist in the development, implementation, and ongoing improvement of standard operation procedures
9. Ability to multi-task and simultaneously work on several complex projects, with the ability to learn and adapt quickly. 
10. Assist in network design and implementation using company specific vendor technologies, Cisco, Sonicwall, Barracuda, Meraki
11. Familiarity with LAN, WAN, DMZ technologies:  MPLS , IP Routing, VLAN, QOS
12. Advanced experience in Windows server and back office technologies:  AD, GPOs, SQL, MySQL, Sharepoint, Office 365/Azure
13. Experience with virtualization technologies based upon VMWare/ESXi
14. Understanding of SAN and NAS technologies
15. Experience of VOIP technologies 
16. People/Vendor Management skills. 
17. Provide deskside “Front line” support as required
18. Serve as the local IT site leader in the Asia PAC region
19. Occasional after hours support for escalations\implementations
20. Strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills 
21. Effective written and verbal skills, (Mandarin/English)
22. Commitment to customer service
23. ERP Support (Oracle/Epicor)
24. Windows desktop experience including MS Office applications
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
1. Bachelor degree in Computer Sciences or related field of study, or equivalent experience 
2. Certifications desired MCSE

job_lists.title: 軟體開發高手(須兼PM 5.2萬~8.5萬)
job_lists.company: 元威資訊科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果您是軟體開發高手，需要有戰場發揮，想藉由高水準的使用者需求來不斷磨練自己多方面的程式開發經驗與能力，那這個職務將會是您最佳的選擇。
我們專營軟體量身訂做，客戶都具有相當規模(多數為大銀行)，軟體工程要求之水準相對也比較高。從元威跳槽到其他銀行的離職同事都覺得技術上游刃有餘、但也感嘆很難能像在元威一樣在技術上不斷快速成長。 元威內部有一套客觀公正的方法，可以計算您的軟體產出；如果您很有能力、也喜歡開發軟體，那到元威上班將會如魚得水，工作開心、收入也開心。
對於小專案需要能獨力面對、自己當PM。
基本上使用微軟技術C#、asp.net、MVC 但也接受JAVA、android的可獨當一面的開發者。

公司就在捷運板南線(後山埤站出口)交通方便。
job_lists.other_condition:
程式開發高手、對於技術的成長會當成自己的責任，
同時須 open mind 可接受不同的意見, 可團隊合作 是必要的要求。

job_lists.title: F11 IT PROJECT MANAGER, EAD (Taoyuan)
job_lists.company: 台灣美光記憶體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
You must demonstrate various levels of strategic planning including identifying project requirements, establishing clear and achievable objectives, coordination and adapting the specifications and approach to the different concerns and expectations of various stakeholders, and adhere to the Micron Project Methodology and project standards.
The IT Project Manager is a strategic role that requires collaboration with business stakeholders to ensure business needs are met. This includes understanding how a project impacts the strategic roadmap of the business and aligning project execution to help achieve business objectives.  
 
Responsibilities and Tasks 
 •  Lead and manage project teams.
 •  Provide leadership within the team environment. Set the right tone given the needs of the project.
 •  Define a project vision and gain team commitment to it. Provide support to all team members working to achieve it.
 •  Identify all affected stakeholders and resources required.
 •  Ensure collaboration occurs between staff of all departments and vendor organizations.
 •  Resolve conflict within the team.
 •  Provide specific performance feedback to team members and their managers.
 •  Participate, as requested, in the recruitment and placement Micron staff and consultants into projects.
 •  Manage project resource allocations.
 •  Build a cohesive and high performing team.
 
Manage communications.
 •  Represent the project to its governing authority and other management as requested.
 •  Ensure information flow to all areas and members of the project team.
 •  Provide status reports as indicated by Project Management Office (PMO) and other governing bodies.
 
Manage the project schedule and budget.
 •  Develop and maintain a detailed project schedule in collaboration with team members.
 •  Identify and drive to interim and major milestones that the team is to meet.
 •  Deliver projects within the timeline that has been formally approved.
 •  Deliver projects within the budget that has been formally approved.
 
Manage project risks and issues.
 •  Identify, document, and respond to risk with mitigation, contingency, or other risk response plans.
 •  Document, monitor, and resolve issues.
 •  Escalate risks and issues to the appropriate level and formality for resolution.
 •  Perform problem solving at the individual, team, or leadership level.
 
Manage project scope and change.
 •  Ensure project requirements are gathered, documented, and formally approved.
 •  Control the work of the project such that all scoped deliverables of the project are delivered and meet quality standards.
 •  Manage change and work into or out of the project to avoid gold-plating or additional deliverables not change-controlled into the scope. Provide schedule or resource impacts as appropriate.
 •  Ensure appropriate data and/or metrics are used to evaluate the completeness and quality of project deliverables.
 
Manage process compliance.
 •  Ensure team members observe and support PMO processes and procedures.
 •  Involve the appropriate parties to ensure that technology solutions are compatible with Micron’s enterprise architecture, service environment, and policy.
 •  Ensure that project-level (or phase-level if appropriate) lessons learned are documented and distributed.
 
Manage integration and negotiation.
 •  Ensure support for the needs of related projects and their respective project and program managers.
 •  Ensure the project receives support from dependent projects or organizations.
 •  Ensure the project provides a good transition to long-term support organizations.
 •  Coordinate timelines and system environments across projects and programs.
 •  Operate in a shared resource environment, including Micron direct and consulting resources.
 •  Observe current portfolio and company priorities.
 •  Participate, as required, as a member of the program leadership group.
job_lists.other_condition:
ucation Required
•  Bachelors Degree
•  Computer Science 
•  Management Information Systems (MIS)
•  Related field of study
 
Desired Certificate
•  Project Management certification
   
Experience Required
• Working in an IT environment
• Familiar with Big Data Solutions
• Managing Information Systems projects
• Developing schedules, including milestones
• Critical path, resource leveling, and detail task scheduling

job_lists.content:
As a member of the Netgear Taiwan Engineering Center, you will be responsible for software engineering design and implementation management for the home wireless networking products.

• Experience in project and people management.
• Strong understanding of the system product development cycle.
• Effective organization, project management and coordination skills.
• Ability to track and resolve issues.
• Ability and willingness to take ownership of product and to get the job done with minimal supervision.
• Good communication skills in English, both written and verbal.
• Self-starter who works well in a team environment.

job_lists.title: Product Engineering Manager/Senior Product Engineering Manager (Cable)
job_lists.company: 網件有限公司
job_lists.content: As a member of the Retail/Service Provided Engineering team, you will be responsible for managing the development of Cable products targeted at service providers and Retail that provide Cable Modem, Home Gateway, Voice over IP (VoIP) services.  These products will incorporate most of the following technologies:  Cable DOCSIS 3.0 and 3.1, PacketCable 1.5/2.0, DNS/DHCP, IP, HTTP, SNMP, MGCP, SIP, IMS, IGMP, 802.11n/ac/ad Wireless, Ethernet, VPN, Firewalls.  The primary function of a product development engineers at NETGEAR is project management and technical oversight.  The product development engineer manages the ODM to ensure that products are delivered in a timely fashion to a high quality and in accordance with the NETGEAR procedures and systems.  In addition the engineer oversees the activities between the component vendors and the ODM.  Within the Retail/Service Provide Group, another important project management aspect is working with the sales Engineers to get products approved at service providers.  The engineer must manage the technical issues that arise during the approval process and ensure a rapid resolution by working with and through the sales engineers, ODMs and Component vendors. Job Responsibilities• For assigned projects, take overall responsibility for delivering the product to production; including requirements generation, hardware, firmware, documentation, regulatory testing and Agile release requirements, per Netgear policies.  It is expected that projects should be managed with minimal supervision.  • Project management.  Develop, publish and meet schedules, keep all stakeholders informed of product status at all times• Project Execution.  Manage the suppliers' (ODM, chip vendor, etc.) product development process. • Product Verification.  Manage verification testing of product features and performance and able to test field issues as needed.  • Customer Certification.  Manage qualification of products with customers.• Documentation. Provide input for manuals, help files, gift boxes, application notes and tech support web pages.• Support. Resolve any 3rd level technical support escalations.  • Manage Product Betas with end-users in the field and resolve open issues.• Travel as necessary for product certification issues at customer location.• Track industry technology developments, supplier roadmaps, standards bodies and make product recommendationsSkills and Requirements• BSEE/MSEE with 5-10 years experience in networking hardware/software product development• In depth domain knowledge in IP networking for Home gateways and Cable Labs DOCSIS 3.0 and 3.1 and related cable standards (PacketCable, CCAP, PON etc.) • Knowledge of CMTS, RF configuration, DHCP/TFTP provisioning server is a plus• Strong understanding of home and WiFi networking.• Engineering background with significant hands-on experience in product development.• Experience certifying products with large service providers for deployment.• Strong understanding of the development cycle of technology products, specifically test driven development, able to track and resolve issues.• Effective organization, project management and coordination skills; ability to get the job done.• Ability and willingness to take ownership of product; get the job done with minimal supervision.• Teamwork.  This position requires a close working relationship with the extended Netgear team, including engineering, operations, sales, customer support, marketing and program management.  • Good communication skills, both written and verbal.• Experience working in a start-up environment.• Self-starter that works well on a team.• Adaptive to ever-changing situations and answer the challenges

job_lists.title: Software Engineer
job_lists.company: 倫發科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Summary:
The Software/Network Engineer (SNE) role is to develop/implement data mining services/applications to be used to mine network/server data for information and produce knowledge that will be used to improve the company's infrastructure. The SNE will work with internal infrastructure team to understand their needs and objectives and to implement software solutions to help meet those objectives. He/She will design and implement Business Intelligence(BI) software and system, including integration with databases and data warehouse for delivery of critical infrastructure information. The SNE will be responsible for ensuring high levels of BI availability through support functions and in-depth testing. The SNE will work closely with Projects Managers and staff to interpret and document requirements, propose/develop reporting solutions, troubleshoot report performance issues and assist with implementations.
This position is expected to act with independent judgement and enhance the Company's Infrastructure performance BI systems and its delivery of high quality information to infrastructure team. The SNE is expected to participate in organizational quality improvement projects, continuous process improvement projects and exhibit quality work practice to others by example.
General Responsibilities:
1.Keep up to date on the IT Infrastructure industry.
2.Devise, develop, and deploy required data queries in response to business/infrastructure users.

Daily Operational Responsibilities:
1.Work with project managers, internal IT staff and other stakeholders to integrate data mining applications with existing systems and to ensure a match between the BI environment and the business requirements.
2.Work with project managers to design user reporting.
3.Implement and maintain KPI business dashboards, graphs and portal interfaces.
4.Design, build, test and revise reports and dashboards to meet business needs.
5.Implement reports, forms, queries and data extractions based on user requirements.
6.Design, code, test and document all new or modified changes to the data mining systems/applications.
7.Communicate schedule and updates on the development of data mining solutions.
8.Build, test and deploy reports.

May be required to perform other duties when assigned.
job_lists.other_condition:
Knowledge & Skill Required:
1.Strong understanding of software development concepts, theories, and practices.
2.Excellent software development skills (both window & Linux Environment), with ability to work independently.
3.Able to apply good database designs. 
4.Experience working with open source developed solutions (e.g ELK) will be preferred.
5.Experience working with shellscripts and regular expression is a MUST.
6.Hands-on knowledge with monitoring tools (e.g. CACTI) will be preferred.
7.Have experience using in both Microsoft and Linux environments.

Education/Work Experience:
The minimum qualifications for this position are college diploma or university degree in the field of computer science and 2 - 3 years of direct work experience. 3 – 4 years of equivalent work experience may be substituted for education requirement. Network Infrastructure experience and statistical reporting background will be preferred. 

Personal Contributions:
1.Good written and oral communication skills.
2.Bilingual in Mandarin and English; Living and working experience in both English speaking and Chinese speaking will be a plus.
3.Ability to self-motivate and work independently.
4.Ability to effectively prioritize and perform tasks in a high-pressure environment.
5.Experience working in a team-oriented and collaborative environment.
6.Ability to think logically and keen attention to details.

5.負責專案風險之管理與排除。
1.負責軟體之分析、設計以及程式撰寫。

3.進行軟體之測試與修改。
4.規劃、執行與維護量產的產品。

job_lists.title: Cyber Security Program/Project Manager
job_lists.company: UL_優力國際安全認證有限公司
job_lists.content:
【 Job Description】
The Cyber Security Sales Engineer is responsible for providing technical pre-sales engineering support to the sales team.  This individual will join a high functioning sales team, playing an integral role in provide technical security knowledge and support to prospective clients in Greater China.  This role will require strong verbal and analytical skills in order to properly understand the cyber security concerns and needs of the prospective client, and present potential solutions. 

【Job Responsibilities】
• The individual must be well versed in multiple markets, and leverage industry knowledge and experience to understand and articulate prospective customer requirements to sales
• The individual must be a strong communicator in order to:
o Develop and conduct webinars
o Present at trade shows and events
o Periodically conduct workshops and training
• Provide technical content for proposals in response to Requests for Proposals (RFP) and Requests for Information (RFI)
• Work closely with sales in order to understand prospective client needs and present potential solutions
• Successfully engage in multiple, concurrent technical sales initiatives
• Conduct training workshops on customer’s product design for compliance against the applicable security requirements.
• Well versed in cyber security standards

【Preferred Skills】
• Broad knowledge of security as it relates to software, IT products, IoT, and automotive
• Strong analytical skills required
• An understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into concrete, deliverable solutions
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group of executives, managers, developers and other subject matter experts
• Strong results oriented self-starter
• Ability to work in a team environment
• 5+ years in pre-sales experience within the Cyber Security industry
• Ability and willingness to travel 50%+
job_lists.other_condition:
【Qualifications】
• BS in Computer Science (Software), Computer Engineering, MIS, or other related discipline; equivalent experience may be acceptable.

【Attributes】
• Honest, trustworthy, high integrity, and follow through
• Resourceful/Takes initiative
• Quality/Excellence
• Clear judgment and effective decision making
• Pragmatism/Problem solving
• Abstract critical thinking; analytical thinking
• Strong organization/Planning/Time management
• Customer-service oriented
• Communication with all levels

job_lists.title: IT Solution Lead (Informatica) (Taoyuan)
job_lists.company: 台灣美光記憶體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Our EAD (Enterprise Analytics and Data) team is looking for an experienced Informatica Solution Lead who can help us with developing and supporting our advanced Informatica ETL workflows and mappings. Our environment includes Power Center, Big Data, and Power Exchange services running in a distributed multi-site configuration.
 
The ideal candidate will have not only the required technical capabilities, but will need to be able to communicate well with the team and others inside and outside of their working location. They will be able to think critically to come up with new and innovative designs/solutions and debug complex issues to resolve active problems quickly and effectively.
 
Our organization uses Agile scrum teams/methodology to both move quickly and adapt to unexpected ambiguity in and effective and productive manner. Understanding of and previous experience with Agile teams is highly desired.
 
The selected candidate will perform analysis, design, programming, testing, and configuration of ETL processes for the enterprise data warehouse. Additionally they will need to be able to troubleshoot problems with these processes and may be involved in upgrades the system when needed. 

Location: Based in Taoyuan

  
Required skills:
• Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience as ETL developer in a Data Warehouse environment using Informatica
• Current experience with Informatica PowerCenter ETL design and development
• Current experience with complex SQL including Query performance tuning
• Experience with high-volume Relational databases and large data-sets
• Experience with code management tools such as GitHub and SVN.
• Experience working with Teradata
• Proven experience of Data Warehouse modeling and designing of STAR/SNOW FLAKE schemas
• Experience in analyzing data models and developing ETL mappings
• Experience performance tuning ETL mappings for high volume databases
• Knowledge of Agile/SCRUM methodologies
• Be able to take directions and complete tasks on-time with minimal supervision
• Strong verbal, presentation, and written communication skills
• Strong initiative, ability to self-manage and also work in a team environment
job_lists.other_condition:
Desired skills:
• UNIX shell scripting experience
• Informatica Power Exchange
• Technically fluent with multiple relational and non-relational databases
o Teradata, SQL Server, Oracle, Hadoop (HDFS, Hive, Hbase, etc)
• ETL architect skills
• Experience in working with unstructured data using Informatica data transformation services (DTS)
• Informatica data quality (IDQ)
• Informatica data masking
 Nice to have:
• SQL Server Integration services (SSIS)
• Experience with Informatica and Continuous Integration processes

Education:
B.S. degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or equivalent work experience

job_lists.title: Customer Success Manager
job_lists.company: AylaNetworks_香港商艾拉物聯網路有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Ayla Networks is an exciting start-up delivering a PaaS platform for the Internet of Things. The Ayla Platform™ is the industry’s only complete end-to-end solution for transforming everyday products into cloud-connected devices quickly, easily and economically.  Ayla combines its innovative and highly efficient technology with best-in-class hardware, applications, cloud-based services and digital information services to allow manufacturers to reinvent their products for the smartphone era.

<Job Description>
As a Customer Success Manager, you will be a key member of our fast growing Customer Success Team. You will be responsible for managing multiple customers ranging from marquee global brands to innovative upstarts to help them successfully launch amazing connected products. The ideal candidate thrives in a fast paced environment and is passionate about being a customer advocate and a trusted strategic advisor by constantly acquiring and upgrading the required skills and domain knowledge. You build strong and long lasting relationships with your customers and your efforts will drive customer satisfaction and happiness. 

<What You Will Be Doing>
* Own the post-Sales Customer Relationship: Build strong, trusted advisor relationships with key customer contacts to deliver an exceptional Ayla experience
* Manage multiple client relationships with a focus on quality of relationships, adoption, retention and satisfaction.
* Work closely with Ayla’s Product, Sales, and Professional Services teams to quickly onboard customers, design solutions, and surface issues before they become real problems
* Project Manage/Lead technical customer implementations as needed
* Drive continued product engagement, including contract renewal and up-sell opportunities through trusted advisor relationships
* Proactively identify and lead team process improvements
* Strategically incorporate customer feedback into the Ayla platform by collaborating with Ayla product management team

<Desired Skills and Experience>
* The ideal candidate will have 5+ years experience in a customer facing post-sales role, ideally providing professional services or customer success functions in a technology-related field such as networks, security, cloud/SaaS, PaaS or ioT
* Proven track record of managing customer engagements across multiple stakeholders.
* Demonstrated ability to understand technical concepts/solutions, customer use cases and guide strategy to deliver positive results for customers
* Self-starter who thrives under ambiguity in an extremely fast-paced, deadline oriented startup environment
* Familiar with OEM/ODM manufacturing business model 
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Creative, resourceful, detail-oriented, and highly organized
* Applications/Tools (Optional but nice to have): Experience working with SalesForce CRM and Customer Success software services
* S/M.S degree in a related field.

This position will be part of a new, exciting and high growth industry. If you are a driven Engineer with the applicable knowledge and experience, please apply today!

job_lists.title: 資深軟體設計工程師（網絡/服務器）
job_lists.company: GoAnimate_香港商高創動訊有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content: 成立於2007年，GoAnimate不單是動畫影片創作之先行者，並已發展成為國際領先的雲端平台，開創了市場推廣、銷售及培訓團隊創作及分享影片的全新方式。目前，GoAnimate於全球擁有超過850萬名登記用戶，自成立以來，用戶透過GoAnimate已成功製作逾2200萬齣影片用戶可以透過GoAnimate 的平台，簡單快捷地自行製作動畫，讓商界、學校、中小企以至個別用戶便捷地在網上直接製作及發佈動畫影片。為進一步鞏固其領先的行業地位，GoAnimate將擴大旗下團隊，邀請具熱誠的人才於加入其工程師團隊。如果-你希望你的工作，能夠影嚮世界上數以百萬計的人，-你希望能加入一個正在快速成長的公司-你熱衷於設計，技術和動畫我們都誠邀您的加入。想了解我們的平台，文化和故事 請點擊  http://goanimate.com。工作細節-協助軟體部門主管及其管理的臺灣軟體開發團隊生產出穩健的，維護性高的和安全的軟體代碼。-帶領我們在臺灣的軟體開發團隊進行核心產品的功能開發, 使用最新的網絡技術（如HTML5, NodeJS, React, React Native及其相關框架）及提供必技術支援。-本職位適合對軟件開發團隊管理一定經驗程度的初級或資深軟體工程師。應聘要求-電腦科學或相關學科的本科以上學歷-擁有帶領或管理網絡軟體工程團隊有至少有4年或以上的經驗-兩年或以上帶領軟體開發團隊的經驗-對以下至少一種程式語言擁有可證實熟悉的程度 (NodeJS, HTML5/CSS, Javascript 客戶端框架, React, Android SDK, iOS SDK, Redis, AWS)-對有關CIS ，軟件測試方法的開發（test-driven development methodologies）及網絡自動化測試框架（automated testing frameworks for web）有經驗者將優先考慮-對軟體開發框架及整個軟體的開發過程擁有良好記錄者將優先考慮-注重細節和思考及擁有活潑的思維-熟練的英語會話和寫作公司優點及福利-開放和平板的企業文化，可以讓你能真正地發揮所長-友好和講求合作的工作環境-年終績效獎金-十四天年假-生日假期-每週一午餐免費-免費小吃About GoAnimateGoAnimate is the world-leading online animated video creation platform.  Our mission is to enable businesses, schools, and individuals to make videos — quickly and easily.With over 8.5 million users, our platform is used everyday for creating high impact videos. More than 22 million videos have been created using our technologies.If you're interested in seeing your work used by millions of people all over the world, if you're excited about joining a fast growing company, if you're passionate about design, technology, and animation, please apply.  Come check out our applications, our culture, and our story -  http://goanimate.com.About the roleIn this role you will assist the Head of Engineering in managing a team of software developers to produce robust, maintainable and secure production code for our animation platform, and acting as a deputy for the Head of Engineering in Taiwan.Your main responsibility will be to provide technical guidance to the Taiwan team, as well as collaborate with your peers in Hong Kong to architect and lead the development of core product functionality using the latest web technologies (such as HTML5, NodeJS, React, React Native, and related frameworks).This is a hands-on role suitable for a junior development manager, or senior technical lead with proven team leadership experience.Candidate requirements-Bachelor degree or above in Computer Science, IT or related disciplines-At least 4 years of experience at a team lead level in a web software engineering team, or 2 years of experience as a development manager-Working knowledge of at least one of the following: NodeJS, HTML5 / CSS, Javascript client frameworks, React, Android SDK, iOS SDK, Redis, AWS-Previous experience with CIS, test-driven development methodologies and automated testing frameworks for web development would be beneficial-Proven track record of architecture and delivery of web software-Attention to detail and think-outside-the-box mentality-Good command of EnglishBenefits -Open and flat culture that lets you make real impact-Friendly and collaborative work environment-Performance-based yearly bonus-14 days annual leave-Birthday Holiday-Free lunch every Monday-Free snacks, fruits, coffee, and other drinks

job_lists.title: Integration Consultant (Advanced Software Engineer)
job_lists.company: 台灣飛利浦股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
In this role, you have the opportunity to
•      Deliver professional integration service to project including data exchange of device and systems

You are responsible for
• Work with project manager and solution architecture for integration tasks.
• Designs and leads the integration part of solution project.
• Implementation and testing of complex IT integration solutions following industry and proprietary real-time patient data exchange requirements.
• Design or modify software object or module to fulfill the data exchange requirement or issue of Philips product and foreign system.
• Design customized report/form for project requirements.
• Communicate and design the interface or method for 3rd party application data access.
• Provides consultation to healthcare institutions on healthcare IT integration strategies and system integrations.
• Troubleshoots complex system integration issues to insure acceptable Quality of Service.

To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience
• Bachelor degree or above in Information Systems Technology, Computer Science or related field preferred; or two years formal education combined with appropriate high tech-related experience.
• Demonstrated knowledge and/or advanced certifications in specific areas of expertise such as Integration for HL7, API, device data transfer, data exchange between different systems. 
• Experienced in IT project implementation.
• Experienced in Integration Software, eg. Rhapsody, Biztalk, TIBCO, webMethods and etc. is desirable.
• Experienced in MS SQL server, including database and reporting service (SSRS) is desirable.
• Experienced with PACS/HIS/EMR development is desirable. 
• Orion Health Rhapsody Integration Engine certified is desirable
• HL7 certification is desirable.
• SQL/JavaScript is must.
• Can design customized report/form for solution requirements.
• Deliver required results with high levels of quality.
• Strong organizational, time management and planning skills in order to be successful in a role performing a wide variety of tasks associated with varying customer needs, and an ability to change focus quickly as demands change

job_lists.content: At KKBOX, we are building a big data analytics workflow in the cloud by leveraging open source technologies like Hadoop and Spark. You will focus on building Hadoop/Spark workflows and platforms upon which our teams build, deploy, and run their tasks and researches. Whether it is building tools to allow for better exploration of the data, creating services to help coordinate work on the platform, or creating new ways to write software that is simple yet powerful, we have a lot of exciting problems to solve and many smart people to work with while we make KKBOX the best place to enjoy music worldwide.*Responsibility- Build Hadoop/Spark workflow.- Ensure maintenance and reliability of the Continuous Integration (CI) environment.- Assist and support downstream maintainer activities.- Monitor Amazon Web Services (AWS) performance.*Requirement- Proven programming expertise. job_lists.title: 資深軟體設計師
job_lists.company: 雲杉科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
資深軟體設計師除了帶領軟體設計師一同開發建置系統外，最重要的是指導軟體設計師讓他成長，讓體設計師學習開發方式、習慣、系統規劃分析、資料庫規劃分析、以及現場觀摩與客戶的互動與折衝，進行全方位的學習。
我們的體驗是『教學相長』，經過準備教學、實際教學，導師對於課程議題會有更深刻的體會，也會經由互動發現新的角度與方向。
除了現有的工作之外，資深軟體設計師還有一個重要的職責：探索。
你需要探索新的工具、新的函式庫、新的開發流程、新的程式語言甚至新的產品領域。
對於資深軟體設計師，我們的最終期望是『伙伴』，我們期望對軟體領域有興趣的朋友進來一同探索，共同成長。

你有學到，公司才有收穫。
你有成長，公司才有效益。
我們不尋找工人(只看眼前規格辦事的軟體生產線)，我們尋找農人(看著眼前的秧、思考整座田)或是願意學習當農人的人。
我們的信條之一，程式語言只是工具，成就產品才是目的。所以我們不會專注在某一門程式語言，如果有專注在某一門程式語言的請不要投遞履歷。

我們的日常作業流程是：
每天早上在Slack用Geekbot做自動化daily meeting。
開發流程是Trello作看板記錄搭配BitBucket做事件與版本控制並且自動同步至各專案的Slack Channel。
公司大小事務與各種技術研究與討論在Slack也都有相對應的Channel，使用Slack的永久記錄功能讓後進同仁也能往前與其他同仁同步。

目前我們的Skillset如下：
JavaScript: AngularJS 1 + Bootstrap
Java: Java SE 8, Servlet + JSP

目前我們有在研究的領域如下：
JavaScript: Angular + TypeScript / ReactJS
CSS: Bootstrap 4
Golang: API Server, Service Gateway, Home Automation
biometrics: Voice Biometrics, Facial Recognition, FIDO
Server Platform: kong, spark framework

job_lists.content: The primary responsibility of the Systems Engineer is technical ownership of the delivery / refresh of Lenovo Branded V series products.  The Systems engineer will be responsible for working with partners to resolve issues associated with these products while understanding the product features.   This position works in cooperation with the Technical Project Manager and Storage partners to ensure product deliverables are met.   Responsibilities also include coordinating and communicating with multiple teams, including the storage partner’s engineering team, product assurance, supply chain, and support, to ensure product launches and updates are timely and accurate. The Systems Engineer should have the ability to coordinate with subject matter experts, worldwide project team members, and work with the technical staff for information development and support.

Act as an advisor to program team regarding projects, tasks, and operations • Document internal business policies and practices.• 5-7+ years of directly related experience that includes working with IT systems, preferably storage products. • Working knowledge of storage systems including setup, configuration and associated server/switch infrastructure.• Knowledge of the principles of project management. • Ability to assess customer needs, including business requirements definition, data definitions, and operational requirements definition • Ability to plan work to accomplish project goals • Ability to work independently with minimum supervision • The formal education of a bachelor’s degree is required. Applicants must also demonstrate experience on projects with a high degree of complexity.

job_lists.title: 2161: Consumer Data Science Project Manager
job_lists.company: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: The Consumer Data Intelligence team's mission is to transform CBU into a modern, insight-driven organization.  We have created a Data Lake infra and insight analytical engines.  We want to leverage the technology we built and the methodologies we developed to deliver data insight to help on innovating value products/services, growing business, improving processes and making better strategies and decisions. As a Project Manager in Consumer Data Intelligence (CDI) team, you will assist CDI team in managing high-priority projects on-time through facilitating all activities associated with an individual project in accordance with the established policies, procedures, and requirements of the CDI team.  The Project Manager will proactively monitor projects throughout the project life cycle from inception to completion. job_lists.title: Java Software Engineer(BPM System)
job_lists.company: 伈創資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
這個職位徵求的是 J2EE/J2SE 的開發工程師，專注於 Java BPM System 的開發。

BPM(Business Process Management)流程管理系統，是一種整合了電子表單、流程管理及訊息管理三個模組的企業流程管理系統，能有效幫助企業優化和管理相關業務流程，提升工作效率，降低運營成本；常見的應用範例包括請假、請(採)購、人事薪資、出差、費用申請、請款等等。

如果 Java 是你天生倒背如流的語言，我們歡迎你一同加入伈創的技術團隊，打造最佳的智慧簽核系統平台，提供顧客最優質的企業內流程協作體驗。 

身為一個 BPM 的 Java 工程師，您需要熟悉以下工作內容：
- 設計、實作 Java Web 程式並有能力做前置測試
- 開發、設計一個能有效率處理資料的系統，並且能被其他工程師維護
- 撰寫 Java Backend API/Service，並與 JavaScript 前端工程師以及流程引擎的後端工程師做整合性的開發
- 有能力在技術團隊中，與夥伴控同關切彼此的開發進度，協力制定開發流程並能做好 Peer Review Programming
job_lists.other_condition:
- 熟悉 Java 程式語言，若有相關證照 (SCJP, SCWCD 等...) 佳。
- 有 Struts, Spring, JTA 或 Hibernate 等相關 Java framework 使用開發經驗
- 了解前端技術者佳
- 熟悉 jBPM 流程開發工具者佳

job_lists.title: IT Section Manager - MFG Application Development
job_lists.company: 台灣美光晶圓科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: IT Manager of MFG Application Development is responsible for planning, facilitating, organizing, and motivating agile teams to achieve a high level of performance and quality in delivery solutions that provide exceptional business value to users. We are looking for experienced Software Engineers with solid leadership skills that aspire to learn, enjoy helping customers, love to innovate, and dedicate themselves to the development and performance of their team. To be a successful candidate, you must possess strong communication and problem solving skills, which you will use to work with customers, fix problems, and collaborate with your team to deliver high quality service. You will manage high visibility solution delivery using agile methods in a fast-paced environment. You will provide ideas and encourage innovation within your team and you will leverage solid command skills, integrity, teamwork and trust to help your team achieve the appropriate level of planning and provide the right balance of agility and predictability. Responsibilities and TasksProvide Organizational Leadership • Maintain domain knowledge to provide subject matter expertise and ensure the team remains current on required skills• Report on key performance metrics to inform data-driven decisions and drive continuous improvement• Provide timely and honest feedback to inspire team members toward higher levels of commitment and influence• Promote empowerment of the team to build a cohesive, high performing team.• Manage conflict and drive issues to resolution Project Planning and Management• Define project vision, objectives, and roadmap while focusing on regular and timely delivery of value.• Manage project work according to Project Management Office processes, including maintaining the project in appropriate systems, managing gate reviews and other controls, and promulgating status information.• Manage the risk and deployment of deliverables into production and resolve issues that affect release scope, schedule, and quality• Coordinate with other teams who share dependencies to achieve solution delivery according to customer expectations. Develop and Deliver Effective and Efficient Solutions • Work with internal partners and analysts, to implement solutions with business cases focused on solving problems and enhancing decision making with data and information• Collaborate with other IT Solution Delivery teams to share knowledge, ensure alignment and demonstrate unified IT solutions and services• Implement solutions that eliminate or minimize technical debt through a well-designed architecture, data model, and lifecycle• Work with Operations team to understand operational issues escalated to engineering team, assist in prioritizing, and manage communication.

job_lists.title: Android Developer
job_lists.company: AVAST Software (Asia) Limited_香港商愛維士有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for an experienced Android developers to join our talented engineering team to help us build world-class powerfull apps for Android that are used by tens of millions of end customers. You will be responsible for helping create, maintain, and evolve cutting-edge Android apps using the latest tools available. 

Who are we looking for?
● We are looking for developers who enjoy development of smartphone apps and who believe it has a great future.
● We are looking for people who want much more out of work than just sitting 8 hours and collecting a paycheck.
● We are looking for colleagues who are compatible with us on a human level and who will teach us something new.
● We are looking for enthusiasts of smartphones, tablets, as well as other new and interesting technologies (such as Google Glass, iBeacon, smartwatch, and Internet of Things in general).
● We are looking for talented developers who know (or would like to learn) development for iOS, Android or Windows Phone.

What we offer
● You will be part of the whole process of complex smartphone apps development. Beginning with analysis, through interaction design and technical architecture, all the way to development, release and updating.
● You will be on a global team of great developers with years of experience in smartphone apps development.
● Your work will be used by more than 50 million active users all around the world.
● You will be able to be yourself, not just a "resource."
What you’ll get from us:
● an unique opportunity to make a huge personal impact on our products
● a team full of motivated people with years of experience in Android development (we learn from each other and move forward together), often giving speeches at conferences or developers’ events
● 15 days of paid holiday, language courses, trainings
● 3 weeks long initial training in Avast HQ in Prague, Czech Republic
● fun at work (regular hackathons, great team building ...)

Who we are:
We are Avast. We provide the best security and privacy solutions to people around the world. Learn more about us at https://www.avast.com/.
job_lists.other_condition:
What we require
● Good understanding of user experience on mobile devices
● At least 4 years of professional experience developing applications with object oriented or functional languages including at least 2 years in Android app development 
● Ability to demonstrate one or more existing Android apps that you were instrumental in building
● Strong understanding of good object-oriented development practices
● Willingness and ability to learn new technologies; self-starter
● Good communication skills; ability to provide clear documentation
● Ability to work with Product Management, QA, and other development teams remotely 
● Analytical and adept at problem solving with strong attention to detail
● Ability to speak and write in English

job_lists.title: Senior Project Manager
job_lists.company: Tata Consultancy Services Limited Taiwan Branch_印度商塔塔顧問服務有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
1.To organize, control and coordinate project management activities to ensure project implementation, 
o To identify project impacts, benefit, strategy and objectives in agreement with the Sponsor.
o Based on project delegation rule to submit Project Investment Committee ( corporate/ regional/ local) for decision making of GO / NOTGO 
o To define project organization (steering committee/ project committee) according to general principles defined in Cardif Taiwan’s project management methodology.
o To estimate workload, define the project WBS (work breakdown structure) and coordinates project activities.
o To make sure decisions concerning the project are taken on time and followed-up.  Project committee, Steering committee should be held in the regular basis ie. Weekly, bi-weekly, monthly. 
o To track project progression/budget and raise warning in case of schedule delay.  If budget/ schedule is overrun 10 % in COMMIT Phase, it will need to be resubmitted to gain COMMIT approval.
o To identify, mitigate project risks and do action plan, communicate about any risk associated to scope, budget or schedule
o Reports on progress to the Steering Committee
o Requests decisions when needed, ensures appropriate alerts to Steering Committee and upstream
o Ensures Change Management, test strategy and test plan are done and rolled out
o Implementing an adequate monitoring mechanism for the project status. This mechanism will cover cost, quality and planning.
o Monitoring quality and accuracy of projects and project managers deliveries and taking appropriate actions in case of gap with expected levels,
o Coordinate with projects clients and contributors to ensure sufficient allocation of resources to meet projects commitments,
o Ensuring checks on the realization of the tasks allocated,
o Ensuring optimized usage of resources allocated to project scope (manpower, cost, hardware, software),
o Ensuring proper goals setting to each of its activities and for projects under coordination,
o Ensuring that estimations (costs / planning) are performed in an accurate and rigorous manner,
o Ensuring projects budget control,
o Management of the bidding process and selection of the supplier.

2. Ensures proper management and optimization of resources allocated
o Ensuring that resources available are used / deployed in an optimized manner, 
o Ensuring the project team member has the required level of resources to ensure a proper execution of its activity,
o Deciding with project team if activities can be provided by internal resources or external vendor based on available skills, costs and technical level,
o Providing sufficient and appropriate evidences for selection of outsource vendors and having a fair balance between costs / quality and security,
o Ensuring compliance with all governance including but not limited to projects, procurement and security.
o Ensuring to meet the commitments taken with business / region / corporate in terms of timing / costs and quality of delivery. 

3. To lead cross-function project and help the project team has different thinking when the project initiate.
o To coordinator resource conflict between user’s expectation and existing IT resource constraint to get win-win result. 
o Manage expectation of project stakeholders. Effective communication with project steering committee, project team, suppliers, and third party resources in both English and Chinese.
o Challenge solutions and system design where appropriate.
job_lists.other_condition:
- Competency of communication both on oral & written in English & Chinese, problem solving, synthetic, and well-planning, drives similar project precisely,
- Familiar with procurement and outsourcing processes,
- Enough technical background to challenge solution, approaches, and design. 
- Experienced in digitization and business process re-engineering
-       Insurance domain knowledge is a plus
-       Coordination, problem solving, clear logic, synthetic, and well-planning, drives similar project precisely

job_lists.title: 專案管理師 / 專案經理 ( APP PM )
job_lists.company: 威許移動股份有限公司
job_lists.content: ✔ 專案管理師 / 專案經理 ( APP PM )基本條件：(1) 重視團隊合作並尊重不同型態的夥伴。(2) 樂於與他人溝通、凝聚共識以完成任務目標者。(3) 符合 (3.1) (3.2) (3.3) 任何一項者。 (3.1) 擁有軟體開發經驗 1 年以上者。(3.2) 擁有軟體測試經驗 1 年以上者。(3.3) 擁有軟體專案管理經驗 1 年以上者。(4) 有自信可獨當一面解決問題者。加分條件 ( 非必要條件 )：(1) 熟悉 API 規格制定者更佳。(2) 熟悉 SA / SD 者更佳。(3) 擁有 EC 電子商務經驗者更佳。(4) 熟悉專案管理工具者更佳 ( 例如：Jira / Confluence / Slack ... )。(5) 曾經領導專案開發 / 產品開發者更佳。年均不到 30 的新創公司，卻發展出數百萬人使用的 APP 服務，我們要的就是有熱情、有夢想的你，加入我們的行列！(一) 威許移動主要產品與服務：✔ Qsire ─ 客製化商品設計與交易平台 ( 獲選 App Store 最佳新 App )。✔ WishMall ─ 百貨商場與零售業 O2O 解決方案。✔ WishView ─ 百貨商場與零售業 Mobile ERP 解決方案。✔ WishOrder ─ 行動化餐飲訂購服務。(二) 產品與服務描述：---------------------► Qsire---------------------我們相信，每個人都是獨特的個體，而你生活中的一切，也該獨一無二！在 Qsire 你可以親自參與商品的設計過程，讓每個環節加入你喜愛的元素，盡顯個人風采。Qsire 於 2015/11 上線，獲得【 App Store 最佳新 App 】殊榮！你可以在這裡設計專屬於自己的 3D 列印手機殼！我們將持續導入新的客製化商品 ( 服飾 / 鞋帽 / 包包 ... )，發展全球視野的服務。---------------------► WishMall---------------------虛實整合已成為百貨與零售業的發展趨勢，威許移動為新光三越、遠東百貨、誠品書店、屈臣氏、潤泰 CityLink 創新商場、遠雄 U-TOWN 購物中心、北京金融街購物中心、重慶協信購物中心 ... 等，發展各式各樣的 O2O App 應用，透過行動化特性提供便捷服務 ( 虛擬會員卡、行動購物、電子優惠券、餐廳訂位 )，近期更應用 Beacon 技術，實現近端感知與行銷互動，並用於巡檢與查核作業。---------------------► WishView---------------------透過行動設備發展移動式管理策略，建構行動化的營運績效管理系統、事件回報通知系統、部門群組溝通系統；透過安全加密的權限控管機制，即時連入企業 ERP 網路查詢營運數據並取得視覺化分析圖表，結合通報系統接收突發訊息，並以內部溝通群組傳遞指示與應對策略。---------------------► WishOrder---------------------全臺第一個行動點餐服務 MOS Order ( 摩斯漢堡 )，自 2012 年推出以來，獲得使用者廣泛支持，已突破百萬次下載！每天都有成千上萬的用戶，透過這款服務訂購喜愛餐點。威許移動更在 2014 年與優質的飲料連鎖店「大苑子茶飲」合作，協助大苑子發展行動訂購飲料服務，並設計優惠券等行銷機制，掀起一波波秒殺與搶換風潮。2016 年度完成 McDonald's 麥當勞報報 APP，吸引不分年齡群每日集點、領取優惠劵，使用人數節節飆升，天氣鬧鈴一響，優惠就來！威許移動開發的 APP 都能獲得使用者四到五顆星的高度評價，過去三年間，我們開發的 APP 累計已突破 370 萬次下載，協助品牌企業客戶提供更好的行動化服務給終端消費者。威許移動不只是開發程式，更強調使用者體驗，我們重視流程設計、介面設計、視覺設計 ( Flow Design / UI Design / Visual Design )，為的是提供更好的使用體驗！威許移動持續提供穩定服務與高度品質，協助客戶發展長期的行動化策略！我們相信行動化既是趨勢，更能強化顧客關係、增加企業營收、降低企業營運成本、強化營運績效。誠摯邀請年輕的你，加入這個「‎新創」事業體，跳出「舊世代」的包袱，一起追求成長，一起創造價值！

job_lists.title: Scrum Master (軟體開發/Software/台中)
job_lists.company: 新加坡商鈦坦科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Scrum Master
As a Scrum Master, you will grow the Product Owner and Development Teams to be awesome so that they can respond to changes easily to delight customers. You can find Titansoft’s seasoned exposure in professional coaching, facilitation and Agile software development complementary in the quest to improve agility.

How WE can help you:
* 12 days of rest and relaxation for you each year. (P.S. It gets even better over the years!)
* Competitive salaries and bonuses bench-marked against big players in the industry.
* Flexible working hours (Sleep in a little longer after fixing that pesky bug from last night).
* Comprehensive insurance coverage.
* Very well-stocked pantry (We've never head of the term 'Hunger Games', nope)
* Communities of Practice and Workshops catered for your growth and learning.
* Substantial subsidies and programs to keep that creative flow while having fun! (Health promotion program, annual overseas company outing, an annual dinner that nobody will ever forget, etc.)
* Hardcore work and hardcore fun!

Scrum簡介:
中文版，http://www.scrumprimer.org/scrum_primer_cn.pdf
英文版，http://www.scrumprimer.org/scrumprimer20.pdf

Scrum指南：
中文版，http://www.scrumguides.org/docs/scrumguide/v1/Scrum-Guide-CN.pdf
英文版，http://www.scrumguides.org/docs/scrumguide/v1/Scrum-Guide-US.pdf
job_lists.other_condition:
Experience:
* Experienced in software development for at least 3 years.
* Exposed to Agile software development for at least 1 year
* Understood the nature and challenges of software development.
* Experienced in Agile transformation and is familiar with developing products iteratively.

Skills:
* Familiar working in iterative development and Scrum
* Able to create a safe environment where voices can be heard without fear
*Ability to facilitate team's discussions, meetings and conflict resolutions 
* Familiar working with organisation to support team’s growth 
* Able to split product backlog items in ways that will create more possibilities for product.
* Strong awareness, observational skills over the environment and situation on hand. 
* Familiar with technical practices like Refactoring, Test-Driven Development, Continuous Integration and has mentored teams on dealing with legacy code.
Personality and Traits:
* Leadership is the ability to create an environment that enables everyone to contribute productivity.
* Believe that people are not to be repaired and fixed.
* Value relationship and the need to build it
* Reflective and open to learning new skills

Qualifications
Minimum Bachelor in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Management, or related field

job_lists.title: Mechanical Sr. Principal Engineer
job_lists.company: 荷蘭商臺灣戴爾股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Dell is looking for engineers in the field of Mechanical Engineering and/or Thermal Engineering to work on architecting and developing the next generation of personal computing devices and the eco-system around them. In this role, you will be responsible for working closely with other technologists, architects, experience designers, industrial designers, product marketers, and software developers and will learn more about the architecture and definition of computing devices and solutions. Basic understanding of operating systems and software is desired. 
Role Responsibility: 
• Work with internal Dell technology, marketing and engineering teams to develop the architectures and detailed definition of products. 
• Work with internal Dell teams on early development of new concepts and form factors focusing in the areas of mechanicals, thermals, mechanisms, materials and manufacturing technology. 
• Assist in exploring, incubating and developing new technologies and concepts. 
• Role will require product instrumentation, lab testing, error analysis, and data reduction. 
• Role will require the use of ProE for CAD. 
• Role will require basic understanding of analysis methodologies used in the design of mechanical components, mechanisms and structures. 
• Role will require basic understanding and analysis of thermal principals (conduction, convection, and radiation). 
• Basic CFD analysis as required to achieve project goals. 
• Will be required to present all analysis and critical findings in concise presentations to team members and management. 
• Keep management informed of key technical and schedule related risks and issues. 
• Perform detailed or routine engineering assignments such as assisting with the definition of technical specifications, basic design problem resolution, providing product support and assistance to other internal departments. 
• All other duties as assigned.
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements: 
• MS in Mechanical Engineering. 
• Ability to handle responsibilities with effective interpersonal skills. Ability to interface with others inside and outside the Engineering function is required. 
• System level understanding of computing technologies. 
• Knowledge in engineering materials, mass production manufacturing processes and capabilities, tolerance analysis, CFD (Flotherm/IcePak), numerical and computational skills, CAD and FEA a plus. 
• Must have strong communication/presentation skills and some background in basic engineering design. 
• Ability to organize and manage multiple projects, setting priorities and working independently under aggressive timelines.

job_lists.content: 中華數位科技除了多年來致力於提供企業客戶完善的資訊安全解決方案，此外亦發展出具有競爭力的ISO資訊安全制度管理與營業秘密保護等相關顧問服務團隊（相關已發展之服務項目請參閱：http://www.softnext.com.tw/dataprotection/index.html）。為了持續滿足客戶的管理需求及相應的專業服務領域，我們期待擁有豐富技術與產業經驗的【資訊安全管理顧問】人才加入這個團隊。此職務的核心工作項目包括但不僅限於：1.共同協助客戶進行企業內外資訊安全架構規劃2.資安循規與風險鑑識3.資訊安全系統規劃導入與資訊安全產品規劃設計等相關工作。
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 資安領域專業工作職歷（至少具備以下經驗一項以上） (1)具備曾擔任Deloitte、KPMG、PwC或Ernst & Young等會計師事務所「資訊安全顧問」三年以上經驗。 (2) 具備曾主導或參與企業大型資訊系統輔導三年以上經驗，或曾輔導年營收100億以上企業集團客戶導入完整資安架構經驗者。 (3) 具備曾任職企業資訊安全主管具三年以上之經驗。2. 具備資訊安全技術證照尤佳，包括CISSP、SSCP、CEH、CHFI等。3. 熟悉資訊系統架構/雲端與行動應用/資訊安全系統整合之企業解決方案。4. 具備良好溝通與報告撰寫能力、與客戶保持良好關係、視專案需求能配合國內外出差。5. 已具有個人獨立專業知識體系與顧問服務框架。6. 本工作包含大陸一線城市市場開發與客戶輔導，可配合任務需要不定期出差大陸者。

job_lists.title: Software (SW) System Design Director (DTV / STB)
job_lists.company: 台聯科股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description: 
We are seeking a Sr Manager or Director of System Engineering to lead our Taiwan System engineering team.  With a comprehensive understanding of the company’s overall business objectives, the successful candidate will manage and direct Taiwan system team.  The role will work with passionate delivery leads, architects, developers, integrators, QA and third parties across the company and focuses on continuously delivering software development and solution to customers.

Responsibilities: 
 To lead Taiwan engineering team to deliver products to meet business objectives in managing feature scope, change requests and defects to align with the product’s release roadmap and the business’s short term/long term objectives. 
 Implement efficient project management and staffing management to achieve on schedule product delivery.
 Attract, select, coach and motivate team to execute a high standard of quality.
 Proactively recommend actions to maintain cost effectiveness and competitiveness.
 Partner with IC hardware , product marketing and sales team on product roadmap and strategy.
 Lead process improvement initiatives and measurements to improve quality and bottom-line profitability.
 Utilize internal and external customer feedback to improve team performance and enhance deliverables.


Requirements:
 The ideal candidate should have 10+ years of professional experience with a proven track record of successful STB /DTV software development
 Solid experience in embedded system SW development and integration , STB driver, middleware and application development.
 Experience in Linux  internal frameworks development for STB
 Demonstrated ability to manage teams of 20+ employees through development processes and lifecycles for large-scale projects.
 Passion for delivering high quality products.
 Driven to achieve a high level of customer/partner satisfaction. 
 Fluent in both Mandarin and English.

job_lists.title: CITC_Big Data Strategy and Advanced Technology Architect
job_lists.company: 工研院 _財團法人工業技術研究院
job_lists.content: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。優於法規之多元給假制度針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。 幸福成家開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。 幸福安家關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。悠活館設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。 工研餐廳提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。「工研人好健康」促進網絡除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。 諮商室 建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。
